[3] Journal of the Science of Food and Agriculture, 89: 2678–2686. doi: 10.1002/jsfa.3774 [4] J Sci Food Agric. 2011 May;91(7):1230-5. doi: 10.1002/jsfa.4304. Epub 2011 Mar 8.
English.Research: Research indicates antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects, hepatoprotection against CCl(4)-induced oxidative liver damage, and potential antihypertensive benefits.

Chinese.Preparation: 4.5克至20克。浓缩提取物0.5至2克。外用：适量。用水煮沸并洗涤患处或制成粉末涂抹在患处。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在虚寒证中不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 毒性与注意事项：在虚寒证中不宜使用。

English.Preparation: 4.5 g to 20 g. Concentrated extract 0.5 to 2 g. External use: appropriate amount. Boil with water and wash the affected area or make into powder and apply on affected area.
English.Contraindications: not to use in cases of cold from deficiency.
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions: not to use in cases of cold from deficiency.

Chinese.Preparation: 根部剂量：15至39克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 脾虚者慎用。不适合腹泻或大便稀松者，孕期有流产迹象者，以及经期出血较重、频繁排尿者。
Chinese.Research: 见此： http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/query.fcgi?cmd=Retrieve&db=PubMed&list_uids=2402139&dopt=Abstract
Chinese.Notes: 奇异果这一名称是在新西兰为商业目的创造的。现在世界上大多数商业种植者在葡萄和奇异果上使用一种名为福克尔苯氨的生长刺激剂。

English.Preparation: Root dosage: 15 to 39 g.
English.Contraindications: Use care in cases of spleen deficiency. Not suitable for those with diarrhea or loose stool, signs of miscarriage during pregnancy, and heavy bleeding during menses, frequent urination.
English.Research: See this: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/query.fcgi?cmd=Retrieve&db=PubMed&list_uids=2402139&dopt=Abstract
English.Notes: The name kiwi was created in New Zealand for commercial purposes. Most commercial growers in the world now use a growth stimulant called forchlorfenuron on grapes and kiwi fruits.

Chinese.Contraindications: 使用汉防己注射剂不得超过300mg，以避免毒性。大剂量和/或长期使用防己对肾脏有毒。
Chinese.Research: 接受西南宁注射的实验动物显示出反射功能增强、痉挛、瘫痪和死亡。汉防己表明它能调节体温，而木防己具有利尿作用并缓解神经炎引起的疼痛。
Chinese.Notes: 历史上，汉中地区生产的防己称为汉中防己。目前，经过汉口的防己称为汉防己。

English.Preparation: 5-10 grams boiled with water.
English.Contraindications: Using hanfangchin A for injection should not exceed 300mg to avoid toxicity. Large dosages and/or long-term usage of aristolochia fangchi is toxic to kidneys.
English.Research: Lab animals receiving sinomenin injections showed increased reflex functions, spasms, paralysis, and death. Chinese han fang ji showed that it can regulate body temperature, while mu fang ji has diuretic properties and relieves pain from nerve inflammation.
English.Notes: Historically, those produced in the Han Zhong area are called han zhong fang ji. Currently, fang ji passing through Han Kou is referred to as Han fang ji.

Chinese.Preparation: 从海藻岩藻提取；剂量未指定。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不应含有过量的砷、镉和汞。
Chinese.Research: 岩藻聚糖抑制癌细胞的肝素酶和生长因子的分泌，从而导致癌细胞繁殖减弱。
Chinese.Notes: 癌症治疗的补充。

English.Preparation: Extracted from seaweed Laminaria japonica; dosage not specified.
English.Contraindications: Should not contain excessive amounts of arsenic, cadmium, and mercury.
English.Research: Fucoidans inhibit the heparinase of cancer cells and growth factors secretion, leading to weakened cancer cell reproduction.
English.Notes: Supplement to cancer therapy.

Chinese.Preparation: 種子必須磨碎後食用，因為它們的外殼堅硬難以消化。磨碎的種子應該搭配水食用。不建議將亞麻籽用於烘焙食品，因為omega-3脂肪酸在高溫下不穩定。
Chinese.Contraindications: Omega-3極不穩定，若變質會變致癌。避免使用亞麻籽油來進行深煎炸，因為在高溫下不穩定。清洗種子以避免對呼吸系統和肝臟有毒的霉菌。
Chinese.Research: 富含亞麻籽的飲食可能減少基因工程小鼠中前列腺癌的腫瘤大小和侵略性，且部分小鼠完全不會發病。
Chinese.Notes: 亞麻籽是膳食中木酚素的最高來源，比其他植物高出75倍。

English.Preparation: The seeds must be ground for consumption due to their tough indigestible coat. Ground seeds should be taken with water. It is not advisable to use flax seed in baked goods due to the instability of omega-3 fatty acids at high temperatures.
English.Contraindications: Omega-3 is highly unstable and can become carcinogenic if rancid. Avoid using flax seed oil for deep frying due to high heat instability. Wash seeds to avoid molds that are toxic to the respiratory system and liver.
English.Research: Diet rich in flax seed may reduce tumor size and aggressiveness in genetically engineered mice for prostate cancer, with some mice not developing the disease at all.
English.Notes: Flax seeds contain the highest dietary source of lignan, exceeding other plants by 75 times.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服50毫升水煎剂或酒精提取液，每日两次，餐后服用。每个疗程持续30天。
Chinese.Contraindications: 毒性反应包括头晕、心悸、虚弱、恶心、呕吐、胃痛、腹泻、肝脏和肾脏区域疼痛、消化道出血，以及可能致命的呼吸和循环衰竭。长期使用可能导致脱发和免疫系统功能障碍。
Chinese.Research: 从雷公藤提取的四种化合物可能对局灶性节段性肾小球硬化有保护作用。对药理过程的研究显示对免疫系统、抗炎、抗癌及其他功能的各种影响。
Chinese.Notes: 雷公藤是一种高度有毒的药草，特别是皮层，需小心准备以去除树皮。大量服用和/或长期使用可能对肾脏有毒。

English.Preparation: Take orally 50 ml of water decoction or alcohol extract, twice a day after meals. Each therapy period lasts for 30 days.
English.Contraindications: Toxic reactions include dizziness, palpitation, weakness, nausea, vomiting, stomach ache, diarrhea, pain in liver and kidney areas, digestive tract bleeding, and potentially fatal respiration and circulation exhaustion. Long-term use can cause hair loss and malfunctions in the immune system.
English.Research: Four compounds purified from T. wilfordii may confer protection against focal segmental glomerulosclerosis. Research on pharmacological processes shows various effects on the immune system, anti-inflammation, anti-cancer, and other functions.
English.Notes: Lei gong teng is a highly toxic herb, particularly the cortex, which requires careful preparation by removing the bark. Large dosages and/or long-term use can be toxic to kidneys.

Chinese.Preparation: 9到30克。对于赤小豆汤，使用15克，添加水，慢炖约2小时。每天饮用3到5天。对于水肿和促进排尿，使用30克与鲤鱼和陈皮一起煮。
Chinese.Contraindications: 由于其利尿特性，不宜长期使用，以免使身体干燥。不应在蛇咬后100天内使用。

English.Preparation: 9 to 30 g. For chi xiao dou soup, use 15 g, add water, and simmer for about 2 hours. Drink daily for 3 to 5 days. For edema and to promote urination, use 30 g in a soup with carp and chen pi.
English.Contraindications: Not to use for long period because of its diuretic property, which may dry out the body. Should not be used within 100 days of a snake bite.

Chinese.Preparation: 仅供外用
Chinese.Contraindications: 不要内服

English.Preparation: external use only
English.Contraindications: do not take internally

Maladies Treated: 非月经期重度阴道出血
Chinese.Preparation: 用于煎剂的剂量为5到10克；可泡茶用于治疗各种状况。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不要仅仅用于增强性欲。
Chinese.Research: 降低血浆胆固醇和β-脂蛋白，并减轻冠状动脉粥样硬化的损害程度。抑制平滑肌的收缩。止泻。
Chinese.Notes: 根的提取物可以抵抗缺氧。根据不同的疾病提供各种处方和给药方法。

Maladies Treated: lung deficiency with cough and asthma
heavy vagina bleeding not during menses
English.Preparation: 5 to 10 g for decoction; make tea for treatment of various conditions.
English.Contraindications: Do not use it just to enhance sexual appetite.
English.Research: Lowers the plasma cholesterol and β-lipoprotein, and lessens the degree of damage of coronary atherosclerosis. Inhibits contraction of smooth muscles. Stops diarrhea.
English.Notes: The extract of the root can resist oxygen deprivation. Various prescriptions and methods of administration are provided for different ailments.

Chinese.Preparation: 10-15 克，与水一起煮。一包每天。
Chinese.Contraindications: 阳虚者慎用。
Chinese.Research: 毒性与警示。

English.Preparation: 10-15 g, boil with water. One package a day.
English.Contraindications: Use with care in cases of yang deficiency.
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：9到12克。外用：適量使用。使用新鮮或乾燥的藥材。捣碎或研磨成粉，敷在受影響的區域。

English.Preparation: Taking orally: 9 to 12 g. External application: use appropriate amount. Use fresh or dry herb. Smash or grind into powder and apply to affected area.

Chinese.Contraindications: 在热痰伴有气虚和/或阴虚的情况下禁用。
Chinese.Research: 根据广东省华州地区的官方记录，那里出产的橘红尤其有效，因为土壤中含有蒙石（Lapis Micae seu Chloriti），具有止咳的效果。
Chinese.Notes: 生长在华州的橘红吸收了矿物质，因此对治疗咳嗽很有帮助。

Maladies Treated: Itchy throat with abundance of phlegm
Geography: Mao Ming districts of Guangdong province
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of hot phlegm with qi deficient and/or yin deficient condition.
English.Research: According to the official record of the district of Hua Zhou of Guangdong province, the herb ju hong produced there is especially effective because the soil contains meng shi (Lapis Micae seu Chloriti) which possesses the effect of arresting cough.
English.Notes: Ju hong that grows in Hua Zhou absorbs the mineral thus is good for treating cough.

Chinese.Preparation: 煎汤：4.5-9克。与猪脚炖煮或用水煮沸，作为茶饮。
Geography: 印尼爪哇和苏门答腊岛
Chinese.Contraindications: 已记录毒性和注意事项。需要进一步研究副作用。
Chinese.Research: 该草药可以改善因环磷酰胺引起的免疫系统虚弱，具有抗生素和抗病毒特性。
Chinese.Notes: 现代研究表明在调节免疫系统方面的潜在用途。

Maladies Treated: Lack of appetite with no energy
English.Preparation: For decoction: 4.5-9 g. Make stew with pig feet or boil with water and use as tea.
Geography: Indonesian islands of Java and Sumatra
English.Contraindications: Toxicity and cautions are noted. Further research needed on side effects.
English.Research: The herb can improve the immune system weakened by cyclophosphamide. It has antibiotic and antiviral properties.
English.Notes: Modern research indicates potential utility in regulating the immune system.

Chinese.Contraindications: 有效剂量与毒性剂量差别很小。五到六颗果实可以致死。儿童服用0.3~0.4克出现毒性反应。2~4克可导致死亡。
Chinese.Research: 川楝子能驱虫和抑制疼痛。与野菊花合用治疗肝硬化。抑制真菌，如癣菌、白色念珠菌、隐球菌病。
Chinese.Notes: 川楝子意为四川省产的楝子。李时珍在其著作中提到四川产的楝子是最好的。

Maladies Treated: Round worms in the gall bladder and bile duct
Contraction of testes into the cavities
English.Preparation: 3~9 g, smashed.
English.Contraindications: The effective dosage is very close to toxic dosage. Five or six pieces of fruit can cause death. Children taking 0.3~0.4 g had experience toxic reactions. 2~4 g had caused death.
English.Research: Toosendanin can rid of worms and inhibit pain. Chuan Lian Zi with Ye Ju Hua for treatment of cirrhosis of the liver. Inhibits fungi, like Trichophyton, Candida albicans, Cryptococcosis.
English.Notes: Chuan Lian Zi means lian zi produced in Sichuan province of China. Li Shi Zhen mentioned in his works that lian zi produced in Sichuan are the best.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：煎剂 9 - 12 克。或使用新鲜品 30-60 克作为蔬菜。
Chinese.Contraindications: 这是《毒植物中华植物物种数据库》中列出的毒性植物之一。荚果和种子有毒，但经过 2-3 天浸泡或煮沸后浸泡一天后可以作为蔬菜使用。中毒症状可能在 0.5 到 3 小时内出现。
Chinese.Research: 抗微生物研究结果显示，狗爪豆种子提取物对所有测试的细菌均表现出良好的抗菌活性，甲醇提取物的效力优于乙酸乙酯提取物。
Chinese.Notes: 种子提取物可能对多种细菌感染的治疗具有潜力。

English.Preparation: Oral: in decoction 9 - 12 g. Or use fresh item 30-60 g each time as vegetable.
English.Contraindications: This is one of the toxic plants included in the 'The Chinese Plant Species Database of Toxic Plants'. The pods and seeds are poisonous, but after 2-3 days of soaking or after boiling and soak for one day, it can be used as a vegetable. Symptoms of poisoning can occur within 0.5 to 3 hours.
English.Research: Antimicrobial study results showed promising antibacterial activity of Mucuna cochinchinensis seed extracts against all the bacteria tested, with methanolic extract being more potent than ethyl acetate extract.
English.Notes: The seed extract may possess the potential for the treatment of various bacterial infections.

Chinese.Preparation: 对于月经期间出血过多的情况：使用柘树、麻边草、玉树。煎煮成汤饮用。对于明亮视力：使用柘木。煎汤后，用温液洗眼。对于灰尘或蜘蛛网进入眼睛：使用柘树的树汁作为眼药水。用干净的布遮住眼睛，用水擦拭眼睛以去除毒素。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在某些情况下，叶子制成的糖浆可能会导致腹泻。
Chinese.Research: 在动物研究中，柘树可以抑制U27、S180肿瘤、Ehrlich腹水肿瘤细胞并缓解疼痛。在临床应用中，对胃癌、结肠癌和直肠癌有效。
Chinese.Notes: 叶子和茎已被制成糖浆用于癌症治疗。

English.Preparation: For over abundance of bleeding during menses: zhe shu, ma bian cao, yu shu. Make into decoction and use as tea. For brightening eyesight: zhe wood. Make into decoction and use the liquid to wash the eyes while the extract is warm. For dust, or spider web getting into the eyes: use sap of zhe tree as eye drop. Cover the eyes with clean cloth. Wipe eyes with water to rid of toxin.
English.Contraindications: In some cases, syrup of the leaves may cause diarrhea.
English.Research: In animal studies, zhe shu can inhibit U27, S180 tumors, Ehrlich ascites tumor cells and relieve pain. In clinic application, it is effective for cancer of the stomach, colon, and rectum.
English.Notes: Leaves and stems have been made into syrup for cancer treatment.

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：3到20克。浓缩提取物：0.5到2克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在阴虚和缺乏液体的情况下谨慎使用。不建议体质虚弱的孕妇使用，或在使用时要小心，因为它具有雌激素活性。可能不适合与氟喹诺酮类药物一同使用。
Chinese.Research: 小茴香油样本显示出对白色念珠菌的高活性，具有抗氧化特性，并显示出在防止绝经后骨质疏松症中可能的作用。
Chinese.Notes: 腹痛的外用方法是将其在锅中炒热，然后用布包裹并敷在腹部。

Maladies Treated: Stimulating the flow of breast milk
English.Preparation: Dosage: 3 to 20 g. Concentrated extract: 0.5 to 2 g.
English.Contraindications: Use caution in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) and lack of liquid. Not recommended for pregnant women with weak constitution or use with care when using it due to its estrogenic activity. May not be suitable to use with Fluoroquinolone drugs.
English.Research: Fennel oil samples have shown high activity against Candida albicans, possessing antioxidant properties, and demonstrating potential in preventing bone loss in postmenopausal osteoporosis.
English.Notes: External use in abdominal pain involves stir frying in a pan until hot and wrapping in a cloth to apply to the abdomen.

Maladies Treated: 心臟及血液循環系統的有機和功能性障礙
Chinese.Preparation: 對於貝爾麻痺，將馬錢子切片並貼於醫用膏藥上。對於重症肌無力和ALS，浸泡在水中10-14天，然後去皮，用花生油煮30分鐘。乾燥後磨成粉。開始時每天1.5分，逐漸增加到每天3.2到4分。
Chinese.Contraindications: 極為毒性。需在專家指導下使用。可能導致嚴重肌肉痙攣、吞嚥困難及潛在的抽搐。
Chinese.Research: 研究表明，小劑量的士的寧可刺激中樞神經系統，但大劑量會引起癲癇發作。口服後迅速被吸收。
Chinese.Notes: 極具毒性。僅在經驗豐富的從業者指導下使用。

Maladies Treated: organic and functional disorders of the heart and circulatory system
English.Preparation: For Bell's palsy, cut ma qian zi into slices and apply on medical plaster. For myasthenia gravis and ALS, soak in water for 10-14 days, then deskin, and boil in peanut oil for 30 minutes. After drying, grind into powder. Start with 1.5 fen per day, increase to 3.2 to 4 fen per day.
English.Contraindications: Extremely toxic. Use under expert supervision. May cause severe muscle spasms, difficulty swallowing, and potential tetany.
English.Research: Studies show strychnine stimulates CNS in small doses but induces seizures in large amounts. It is quickly absorbed after oral administration.
English.Notes: Highly toxic. Only use under the advice of experienced practitioners.

Chinese.Preparation: 常规剂量为6 ~ 12克，大剂量可达到100克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 肝阳上亢与因尿路感染（湿热）导致的排尿困难者禁用。
Chinese.Research: 待加载
Chinese.Notes: 通常以淮山或淮山药的名义开处方，意指产于淮河谷地的山药。淮山药被认为是更高质量的。

English.Preparation: Normal dosage is 6 ~ 12 g. Large dosages can be up to 100 g.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of liver yang ascending and urination difficulty due to urinary tract infection (damp-heat).
English.Research: To be loaded
English.Notes: It is usually prescribed as huai shan or huai shan yao, meaning shan yao that produced in the valley of Huai River. Huai shan yao is deemed to be better quality.

Maladies Treated: 气滞和/或血瘀导致的闭经
Chinese.Preparation: 3到9克煎汤。
Chinese.Contraindications: 怀孕和月经过多（经期过度出血）时不宜使用。脾虚且无血瘀的情况不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 其煎剂可在体外增强兔肠道的收缩和张力，刺激兔子子宫，在大鼠中抑制血小板凝固，延长血栓形成时间，减少血块形成时间。抑制血栓形成，降低血液粘稠度的效果强于抑制血小板聚集。
Chinese.Notes: 1985版《中医药辞典》将三棱列为黑三棱。

Maladies Treated: Amenorrhea caused by qi stagnation and/or blood stasis
English.Preparation: 3 to 9 g in decoction.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of pregnancy and menorrhagia (excessive bleeding during menses). Not to use in case of spleen deficient without blood stasis.
English.Research: Its decoction can intensify the contraction and tension in vitro intestine of rabbit, stimulate the in vitro uterus of rabbit, inhibit the platelet coagulation of rats, extend the time of thrombosis, reducing the time of blood clots. The inhibition of thrombosis, lowering the blood viscosity was stronger than the inhibition of platelet aggregation.
English.Notes: The 1985 edition of Chinese Medicine Dictionary lists san leng as hei san leng.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服，干草药3到9克，研成粉末。鲜草药：30到60克。煎煮，或与鸡肉或瘦猪肉一起煮汤。外用：适量使用，捣碎后涂抹。
Chinese.Contraindications: 毒性与注意事项：咨询相关资料以获取详细警告和不良反应。
Chinese.Research: 马德拉藤的主要根茎蛋白安科丁具有抑制胰蛋白酶和刺激一氧化氮生成的活性。
Chinese.Notes: 水或酒精提取物显示出多种药用特性，包括抗炎和肝保护作用。

English.Preparation: Taking orally, dry herb 3 to 9 g, make into powder. Fresh herb: 30 to 60 g. Make into decoction or make soup with chicken or lean pork. External application: use appropriate amount. Smash and apply.
English.Contraindications: Toxicity & Cautions: Consult sources for detailed warnings and adverse effects.
English.Research: Ancordin, the major rhizome protein of madeira-vine, has the effect of trypsin inhibitory and stimulatory activities in nitric oxide productions.
English.Notes: The water or alcohol extract has demonstrated various medicinal properties including anti-inflammatory and liver protection.

Maladies Treated: 因肝或胆囊感染引起的黄疸
Chinese.Preparation: 每日 3 - 12 克。可以以煎剂或与其他成分结合的不同形式准备，并用于特定疾病的治疗。
Chinese.Contraindications: 禁用于因脾虚伴阳虚而引起的腹泻或食欲不振。紫花梔子在实验小鼠中引起腹泻。
Chinese.Research: 对消化系统的影响：可以降低升高的肝酶AST。紫花梔子抑制胃酸分泌并促进胰腺酶的分泌。它表现出抗菌特性并具有抗炎效果。
Chinese.Notes: 不同制备的梔子（例如，脚梔子，江梔子）具有不同的特性。脚梔子以更好的镇静特性而闻名。
Chemical Ingredients: 去乙酰紫花梔子酸甲酯

Maladies Treated: Jaundice due to liver or gall bladder infection
English.Preparation: 3 - 12 g per day. Can be prepared in various forms such as decoctions or in combination with other ingredients and administered for specific ailments.
English.Contraindications: Contraindicated in loose stool or loss of appetite due to spleen deficiency with yang deficiency. Geniposide caused diarrhea in laboratory mice.
English.Research: Effects on the digestive system: can lower increased liver enzyme AST. Geniposide inhibits stomach acid secretion and promotes pancreatic enzyme secretion. It shows antibacterial properties and has anti-inflammatory effects.
English.Notes: Different preparations of zhi zi (e.g., Jiao zhi zi, Jiang zhi zhi zi) have varying properties. Jiao zhi zi is known for better calming properties.

Chinese.Preparation: 10到20克。浓缩提取物：0.5到2克。根据病情调整用量。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于脉紧、高热、急性疼痛或便秘的情况。不要在因虚弱和阳虚导致的脱垂情况下使用。
Chinese.Research: 毒性与注意事项：不适用于因虚弱和阳虚（阳虚）导致的脱垂。
Chinese.Notes: 方剂样本：一衣附子败酱散（金匮要略） - 应用：溃疡性结肠炎。
Chemical Ingredients: O-α-L-阿拉伯糖吡喃苷常春藤苷
28-O-β-D-葡萄糖吡喃苷（1--> 6）-β-D-葡萄糖吡喃苷
3-O-β-D-葡萄糖吡喃苷（1-->3）-α-L-鼠李糖吡喃甘（1-->2）-α-L-阿拉伯糖吡喃烯醇酸

Maladies Treated: Postpartum abdominal pain due to clot blood
English.Preparation: 10 to 20 g. Concentrated extract: 0.5 to 2 g. Adjust the amount according to the sickness.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of tight pulse, high fever, acute pain, or constipation. Not to use in cases of prolapse due to weakness and yang deficiency.
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions: Not to use in cases of prolapse due to weakness and yangxu (yang deficient).
English.Notes: Samples of formulae: yi yi fu zi bai jiang san (Jin Gui Yao Luo) - Application: ulcerative colitis.

Botanical: 无瓣芥属 Lepidium apetalum Willd.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服3 -9克（包煮汤剂）或制成丸剂或粉末。外用：适量。用煎剂清洗或制成膏剂涂抹。针对水肿，使用生药。对于痰多的哮喘咳嗽，使用炒过的药材。对于因肺气虚导致的哮喘咳嗽，使用蜜制的药材。
Chinese.Contraindications: 大剂量可能引起胸闷、恶心、呕吐、头晕、惊慌、皮疹、面色苍白、出汗、呼吸困难、心率加快、血压下降和心力衰竭。不要在肺气虚导致的喘鸣和咳嗽或因脾虚导致的水肿情况下使用。
Chinese.Research: 根据中华人民共和国药典，这是正宗的葶藶子。
Chinese.Notes: 生葶藶子的性质是寒的，功能强烈，可能损伤肺功能。炒制后，其作用温和。炒制时应低温。

English.Preparation: To take orally 3 -9 g (wrap for making decoction) or make into pills or powder form. For external use: appropriate amount. Wash with decoction or make into paste and apply. For edema, use the raw herb. For asthmatic cough with abundant phlegm, use the stir fried herb. For asthmatic cough due to lung deficient, use the honey baked herb.
English.Contraindications: Side effects of large dosage can cause tightness in chest, nausea, vomiting, dizziness, panic, rash, pale complexion, sweating, breathing difficulty, increased heart rate, lowering of blood pressure and heart failure. Not to use in cases of wheezing and cough due to lung qi deficient, or in edema due to pixu (spleen deficient).
English.Research: According to the Materia Medica of People Republic of China, this is the authentic ting li zi.
English.Notes: The property of raw ting li zi is cold and its function is drastic and can injure the function of the lungs. After stir frying, its function is mild. Use low heat in stir frying.

Chinese.Preparation: 以粉末形式服用：1到1.5克。用作汤剂：3到9克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 可能出现过敏反应，症状包括面部和眼睛红肿、四肢麻木、头晕、胸闷、心悸、出汗、恶心和心律不齐。月经期间或怀孕期间不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 三七的医学功能研究包括止血、消炎、止痛和改善肝脏健康。
Chinese.Notes: 颞下颌关节综合症：每日一次在下颌最痛的部分涂抹三七酊。5到7天为一个疗程。
Chemical Ingredients: 精油（伽马-穆罗烯、香附烯、α-榈烯等）

Maladies Treated: Disease of the blood vessels of the brain
English.Preparation: Take as powder form: 1 to 1.5 g. Use in decoction: 3 to 9 g.
English.Contraindications: Allergic reactions may occur, with symptoms such as redness and swelling of the face and eyes, numbness in the limbs, dizziness, heaviness in the chest, palpitations, sweating, nausea, and arrhythmia. Do not use during menses or pregnancy.
English.Research: San Qi has been studied for its medical functions including stopping bleeding, reducing inflammation, relieving pain, and improving liver health.
English.Notes: TMJ syndrome: apply san qi tincture on the most painful part of the jaw once a day. 5 to 7 days is one therapy period.
Chemical Ingredients: Ginsenosides (Rb1, Rd, Re, Rg, Rg2, Rh1)

Maladies Treated: 因感染引起的阴道分泌物
Chinese.Contraindications: 推荐在使用前咨询医疗专业人士。
Chinese.Research: 具有体外胆碱酯酶抑制特性，因此改善记忆并增强记忆表现；平滑肌收缩受到抑制。研究表明使用提取物在记忆和情绪上有显著好处。

English.Preparation: In decoction 10 ~ 30 g
English.Contraindications: Consultation with a healthcare professional is recommended before use.
English.Research: Possesses in vitro cholinesterase inhibiting properties, thus improves memory and enhances mnemonic performance; smooth muscle contractions inhibited. Studies indicate significant benefits in memory and mood when using extracts.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服，煎剂，6至12克，或粉末或丸剂。
Chinese.Research: 一项临床研究表明，饮用稀释的白首乌汁后，70%的白发患者在6周内看到头发转黑，50%的秃发患者重新长出新发。
Chinese.Notes: ANAE：酸α-萘乙酸酯酶。环磷酰胺（CTX）是一种用于治疗各种恶性肿瘤的烷基化剂。

English.Preparation: Orally, in decoction, 6 to 12 g, or in powder or pill form.
English.Research: A clinical study indicated that after drinking diluted juice of bai shou wu, 70% of patients with white hair saw their hair turn black after 6 weeks, and 50% of bald patients grew new hair.
English.Notes: ANAE: Acid α-naphthyl acetate esterase. Cyclophosphamide (CTX) is an alkylating agent used to treat various malignancies.

Chinese.Preparation: 内服：0.15至0.3克，去皮榨油（巴豆霜），制成丸或粉末；外用：适量，磨成粉或捣烂成浆，包裹纱布于患处。根：3至9克。叶：适量，用水煮沸洗涤患处。
Chinese.Contraindications: 此药物极具毒性，使用时应极为小心。不适用于孕妇或虚弱患者。不可与全牛子同用。
Chinese.Research: 香豆醇酯是树脂的主要成分。该药物表现出对皮肤粘膜的刺激作用，具有泻药效果，影响胃肠和胆汁分泌，增加血压，并对特定病原体具有一定的抗菌作用。
Chinese.Notes: 种子极具毒性，使用此药物时应谨慎。

English.Preparation: Internal use: 0.15 to 0.3 g, rid of skin and press out oil (ba dou shuang), make into pills or powder form. External use: appropriate amount. Grind into powder or smash into pulp and wrap with gauze on affected parts. Roots: 3 to 9 g. Leaves: appropriate amount. Boil with water for washing the affected parts.
English.Contraindications: This herb is very toxic and should be used with extreme care. Not to use in cases of pregnancy or in weak patients. Do not use with quan niu zi.
English.Research: Phorbol esters is the main ingredient of the resin. The herb exhibits stimulation of skin mucosa, laxative effects, influences on gastrointestinal and bile secretion, increases blood pressure, and has some antibacterial effects against specific pathogens.
English.Notes: The seed is highly toxic. Caution is advised when using this herb.

Chinese.Preparation: 鱉甲應先煮或放在沙中烘焙。口服用量通常為 10 至 24 克，煎煮使用。外用時，製成粉末並塗抹於受影響部位。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在食欲不振、因脾虛而引起的腹瀉情況下不應使用。懷孕期間使用時請謹慎。
Chinese.Research: 軟殼龜甲粉在腫瘤小鼠中顯示出抗腫瘤效果，顯著抑制腫瘤大小和重量，且與 5-氟尿嘧啶相比，副作用最小。
Chinese.Notes: 鱉甲有兩種類型：生鱉甲（sheng bie jia）用於滋養陰，熟鱉甲（zhi bie jia）用於治療肝脾腫大。

Common: hard shell of soft shell turtle

English.Preparation: Bie jia should be cooked first or roasted in sand. For oral use, the dosage is typically 10 to 24 g in decoction. For external use, make into powder and apply to affected area.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of lack of appetite, loose stool due to spleen deficiency. Use with care in cases of pregnancies.
English.Research: Soft shell turtle shell powder has shown anti-tumor effects in mice with transplanted cancer, significantly inhibiting tumor size and weight with minimal side effects compared to 5-fluorouracil.
English.Notes: There are two types of bie jia: raw (sheng bie jia) is used for nourishing yin, and baked (zhi bie jia) is used for treating swollen liver or spleen.

Chinese.Preparation: 6到15克
Chinese.Contraindications: 使用此草藥的酊劑可能導致嚴重的癢、胃痛或食慾減退。服用丹參期間不應使用豆漿或大豆產品，因為這會降低其效果。不要與抗凝血藥物如華法林、肝素等同時使用。
Chinese.Research: 丹參酮因其抗血栓、抗高血壓、抗微生物特性而受到關注，尤其是與豬苓聯用時對HBV的效果。它還顯示出肝臟保護作用並增強冠狀動脈血流。

English.Preparation: 6 to 15 g
English.Contraindications: Administration of tinctures of this herb can lead to severe itching, stomachache, or reduced appetite. While taking dan shen do not use soy milk or soy product because it can lower its effectiveness. Do not use with blood thinning drugs, like warfarin, heparin, etc.
English.Research: Tanshinone has been noted for its antithrombotic, antihypertonic, antimicrobial properties, and effects against HBV, especially when combined with zhu ling. It also shows hepatoprotective effects and enhances coronary blood flow.

Chinese.Preparation: 6到12克
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于寒症、怀孕、月经过多、出血、阴虚伴随盗汗。与土茯苓、贝母、大黄、大蒜不相容。
Chinese.Research: 对循环、抗微生物、抗炎作用、免疫系统影响、中枢神经系统影响、高剂量下对水和钠的分泌影响。低剂量对钾的分泌无影响。高剂量时钾的分泌减少。

Maladies Treated: purpura due to low platelet count
English.Preparation: 6 to 12 g
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cold disorder, pregnancy, excessive menstruation, bleeding, yinxu (yin deficient) with night sweat. Not compatible with tu si zi, bei mu, da huang, and da suan.
English.Research: Effect on circulation, anti micro organism, anti inflammatory, and effect on immune system, effect on CNS, effect on secretion of water and sodium when dosage is increased. Low dosage does not have effect on secretion of potassium. At highest dosage secretion of potassium is decreased.

Chinese.Contraindications: 在脾虚的情况下不宜使用。某些传统来源提到海藻与甘草不相容，但在临床应用中已与甘草一起使用。

English.Preparation: 4.5 - 15 g daily
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of pixu (spleen deficient). Some traditional sources mentioned that hai zao is not compatible with gan cao but in clinical application it is being used with gan cao.

Chinese.Preparation: 對於狂躁症和精神分裂症：生鐵落飲。使用生鐵落煎熬三小時，取此水煎藥服。
Chinese.Contraindications: 與早焦不相容。根據李時珍的說法：'大部分補藥與鐵落相容性不好。'
Chinese.Research: 現代研究表明其作為鎮靜劑和補血藥的各種用途和效果。

English.Preparation: For mania and schizophrenia: sheng tie luo yin. Use 生鐵落煎熬三小時，取此水煎藥服.
English.Contraindications: Not compatible with zao jiao. According to Li Shi Zhen: 'Most tonic herbs are not compatible with tie luo.'
English.Research: Modern research indicates various uses and effects as a sedative and blood tonic.

Chinese.Preparation: 主要作为食物使用；对于溃疡出血，将干根制成粉末，初次服用120克，然后60克混合温开水饮用。对于非月经期出血，使用60克新鲜藤，烘烤成炭状，混合甜米酒。
Chinese.Contraindications: 糖尿病、肾病、痛风、类风湿关节炎或外阴慢性疼痛患者应避免使用。含有高草酸，可能导致结石形成并损害肾脏。
Chinese.Research: 研究表明甘薯与坏死性肠炎及某些饮食习惯有关，同时叶子作为蔬菜对健康有影响。
Chinese.Notes: 胰蛋白酶是一种丝氨酸蛋白酶，有助于蛋白质消化。坏死性肠炎在发达国家可能被低估。

English.Preparation: Mainly used as food; for bleeds from ulcers, make powder with dry root, taking 120 g initially then 60 g mixed with warm boiled water. For bleeding not during menses, use 60 g of fresh vine, bake into charcoal like, and mix with sweet rice wine.
English.Contraindications: Should avoid for people with diabetes, kidney disease, gout, rheumatoid arthritis, or chronic pain in the vulva. High in oxalic acid that can lead to stone formation and damage kidneys.
English.Research: Studies indicate associations with enteritis necroticans related to sweet potato and certain dietary habits, as well as effects on health from leaves as vegetable.
English.Notes: Trypsin is a serine protease that aids protein digestion. Enteritis necroticans can be underdiagnosed in developed countries.

Chinese.Preparation: 3到9克。用于治疗淋巴结结核：八月扎、金银子、海金沙根各120克，天葵子240克。用水煎煮成汤剂，3天内饮用。用于治疗胃肠胀气：八月扎根或果30克。用水煮沸，作为茶饮。
Chinese.Contraindications: 孕期慎用。
Chinese.Research: 我们没有发现任何历史临床记录提到该药材的毒性。
Chemical Ingredients: 皂苷（akebin A, B, C, D, E, F, G）

Maladies Treated: Red urine and difficulty in urination
Warm and discomfort in chest area
English.Preparation: 3 to 9 g. For treatment of lymph node tuberculosis: ba yue za, jin yin zi, hai jin sha root 120 g each, tian kui zi 240 g. Make into decoction with water. Drink in 3 days. For treatment of gastro-intestine flatulence: ba yue za root or fruit 30 g. Boil with water. Use as tea.
English.Contraindications: Use with care during pregnancy.
English.Research: We have not found that any historical clinical record mentioned toxicity of the herb.
Chemical Ingredients: Saponins (akebin A, B, C, D, E, F, G)

Chinese.Preparation: 15~30克；作为草乌头中毒的解毒剂，每次使用4汤匙蜂蜜与温开水混合，口服。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不推荐给12个月以下的儿童、孕妇或哺乳期妇女使用。副作用可能包括头晕、头痛、恶心、呕吐、发热、腹痛、腹泻、呼吸困难、短暂失明，甚至可能导致血压降低，在严重的情况下可能致死。蜂蜜本身是无毒的，但当蜜蜂从有毒植物采集花粉时，蜂蜜可能会有毒。
Chinese.Research: 研究表明，蜂蜜对对乙酰氨基酚引起的肝损伤具有有效的肝保护作用。它抑制真菌，并防止黄曲霉毒素的产生。
Chinese.Notes: 蜂蜜可以增强消化系统，减轻药物的副作用。它常用作补品和面霜中的赋形剂。

English.Preparation: 15~30 g; For antidotes for cao wu tou toxicity, use 4 tablespoons of honey each time mixed with warm drinking water, taken orally.
English.Contraindications: Not recommended for children under 12 months old, pregnant women or during breastfeeding. Side effects can include dizziness, headache, nausea, vomiting, fever, abdominal pain, diarrhea, difficulty breathing, temporary blindness, and even contribute to decreased blood pressure, and in severe cases can result in death. Honey itself is non-toxic, but when bees take pollen from poisonous plants, the honey can be toxic.
English.Research: Honey has been shown to be an effective hepatoprotective agent against paracetamol-induced liver damage. It inhibits fungi and prevents the production of aflatoxin by Aspergillus flavus.
English.Notes: Honey can strengthen the digestive system and ease the adverse effects of medicine. It's often used in tonic pills and creams as excipients.

Botanical: Imperata cylindrica (L.) P. Beauv.var. major (Nees) c. E. Hubb.

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：9到24克。单独使用时，最多可达60克。治疗出血热：白茅根，大黄，芒硝，橘皮，生地黄，麦冬，木通。治疗消化道癌症：白茅根10克，白花蛇舌草12克，半枝莲10克。加水煮沸，作为茶饮用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于脾虚或肾阳虚的情况。若血压低，应谨慎使用，因为其具有利尿作用。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究：待上传

Botanical: Imperata cylindrica (L.) P. Beauv.var. major (Nees) c. E. Hubb.

English.Preparation: Dosage: 9 to 24 g. Using by itself, up to 60 g. For hemorrhagic fever: bai mao gen, da huang, mang xiao, zhi shi tao ren, sheng di huang, mai dong, mu tong. For cancer of the digestive track: bai mao gen 10 g, bai hua she she cao 12 g, ban zhi lian 10 g. Boil with water. Use as tea.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of pixu (spleen deficient) or shenyangxu (kidney yang deficient) conditions. Use care if blood pressure is low because of its diuretic effect.
English.Research: Modern Research: to be uploaded

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：3 ~ 9 克。用于冲击性损伤的治疗：乳香、没药，各 4.5 克，当归尾、红花、桃仁各 9 克。用水煮沸后作为茶饮。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于脾虚或怀孕的情况。
Chinese.Research: 这种精油主要由于辛烷酸酯展示镇痛效果，并具有抗炎和抗菌特性。
Chinese.Notes: 乳香来自乳香树的树脂，通常以进口为主。一些卖家可能会将其他树脂或淀粉混入其中。
Chemical Ingredients: 阿拉伯酸的钙盐和镁盐 20%

English.Preparation: Dosage: 3 ~ 9 g. For treatment of impact injuries: ru xiang, mo yao, 4.5 g each, dang gui tail, hong hua, tao ren 9 g each. Boil with water and use as tea.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of pixu (spleen deficient) or in cases of pregnancies.
English.Research: The essential oil exhibits analgesic effects primarily due to n-octyl acetate and has anti-inflammatory antiseptic properties.
English.Notes: Ru xiang is derived from resin obtained from Boswellia trees and is commonly imported. Some sellers may mix other resins or starches into the product.
Chemical Ingredients: Calcium salt and magnesium salt of arabic acid 20%

Botanical: Asarum heterotropoides Fr. Schmidt var. mandshuricum (Maxim.) Kitag
Asarum sieboldi Mig var. seoulense Nakai

Maladies Treated: 因寒气入肺引起的咳嗽
Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：0.4至3.75克。古典文献提到不超过一钱（3.75克）。不要煮得太久以免油分蒸发。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于因气虚导致的冷汗；因阴虚阳亢引起的头痛；因阴虚和肺中有热引起的咳嗽。不应与山茱萸、黄芪、华石或李陆同用。此药对肾脏有毒，可能在一些西方国家使用是违法的。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究正在进行中。
Chinese.Notes: 它属于马兜铃科。使用时要小心，因为有毒性。

Botanical: Asarum heterotropoides Fr. Schmidt var. mandshuricum (Maxim.) Kitag
Asarum sieboldi Mig var. seoulense Nakai

Maladies Treated: Warms lungs and rid of phlegm
Pain in lower back, knees and abdomen
Cough due to cold entering lungs
English.Preparation: Dosage: 0.4 to 3.75 g. Classical texts mention not to go over one qian (3.75 grams). Do not boil too long because of the evaporating oil.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of cold sweat due to qi deficient; headache due to yin deficient and yang overactive; cough due to yin deficient and heat in lungs. Not to use with shan zhu yu, huang qi, hua shi, or li lu. This herb is toxic for the kidneys and may not be legal to use in some western countries.
English.Research: Modern research to be loaded.
English.Notes: It belongs to the Aristolochia family. Exercise caution in use due to toxicity.

Botanical: 草果 (Amomum tsao-ko Crevost et Lem.)
克拉万豆 (Amomum kravanh Pierre ex Gagnep)
紧果豆蔻 (Amomum compacturn Soland et Maton)

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：1.5到6克。烘烤药材可以减少副作用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在气虚、血虚气虚以及肺胃火旺且无寒湿的情况下不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 精油含有具有止咳、镇静、镇痛和抗炎效果的活性成分。一些成分如香叶醇显示出抗生素和抗真菌特性。
Chinese.Notes: 少量可轻微促进排尿并消除豚鼠体内的蛔虫，但大量可抑制肠道活动。长期加工消费可能导致致癌效应。

English.Preparation: Dosage: 1.5 to 6 g. Roasting the herb cut down the side effects.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of qi deficiency, Blood deficient qi deficiency, and fire is high in lung and stomach with no cold dampness.
English.Research: The essential oil contains active components that have cough-inhibiting, calming, analgesic, and anti-inflammatory effects. Some ingredients like geraniol have demonstrated antibiotic and antifungal properties.
English.Notes: Small amounts mildly promote urination and rid of round worms in guinea pigs, but large amounts can inhibit intestinal activity. Long-term processed consumption can lead to carcinogenic effects.

Chinese.Contraindications: 大量使用对心脏有毒。毒量：30-40克。
Chinese.Research: 白薇的心脏补品成分刺激心肌，改善收缩并减慢心率。白薇可以抑制肺炎球菌。

English.Preparation: 5-10 grams.
English.Contraindications: Larger amount is toxic to the heart. Toxic amount: 30-40 grams.
English.Research: Cardiac tonic ingredients of bai wei stimulate the heart muscle and improve contraction and slow down heart rate. Bai wei can inhibit pneumococcus.

Botanical: 豆云 (Amygdalus davidiana (Carr.) C. de Vos ex Henry)

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：4.5到9克。应在分发前不切成小块。
Chinese.Contraindications: 贫血或怀孕期间禁用。生桃仁有毒。在血虚的情况下使用须谨慎。
Chinese.Research: 桃核种子中糖苷的抗肿瘤促进作用。
Chinese.Notes: 在血燥、血虚的情况下谨慎使用。如过量会有毒。

Botanical: Amygdalus davidiana (Carr.) C. de Vos ex Henry

English.Preparation: Dosage: 4.5 to 9 g. Should not be broken into small pieces until dispensed.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in case of anemia or during pregnancy. Raw tao ren is toxic. Use with care in cases of blood deficient.
English.Research: Anti-tumor promoting effect of glycosides from Prunus persica seeds.
English.Notes: Use with care in cases of xue zao, xue xu (blood deficient). Toxic if overdosed.

Chinese.Preparation: 煎煮：3克至15克。濃縮提取物：0.5至2克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在脾虛的情況下不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 蓮芽提取物對超氧陰離子和羥基自由基的清除作用。

English.Preparation: For decoction: 3 g to 15 g. Concentrated extract: 0.5 ~ 2 g.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of pixu (spleen deficient).
English.Research: Scavenging Effects of Lotus Germ Extraction on Superoxide Anion and Hydroxyl Radical.

Chinese.Preparation: 对于慢性咳嗽，痰多：百部汤，含有百部、麦冬、沙参、桑白皮、百合、茯苓、地骨皮、薏苡仁、黄芪。对于蛲虫：生百部30克，水400毫升。煮至30毫升。夜间在肠道内使用液体。让液体在体内停留过夜。疗程五天。
Chinese.Contraindications: 对于脾虚、大便稀的情况不适用。
Chinese.Research: 观察到毒性及注意事项。

English.Preparation: For chronic cough, abundance of phlegm: bai bu tang containing bai bu, mai dong, sha shen, sang bai pi, bai he, fu ling, di gu pi, yi yi ren, huang qi. For pinworms: raw bai bu 30 g, water 400 c.c. Simmer till 30 c.c. Apply liquid inside colon during night time. Let liquid stay overnight. Five days is a therapy period.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of pixu (spleen deficient) with loose stool.
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions observed.

Chinese: 老虎斑毛 (lao hu ban mao)

Chinese.Contraindications: 孕妇禁用。毒性症状包括喉咙和口腔灼烧感、眩晕、恶心、呕吐、腹部疼痛、频繁排尿、尿路灼烧感、排尿困难、尿中带血、尿中有蛋白、严重情况下，肾功能耗竭。
Chinese.Research: 各种研究表明，该提取物抑制某些癌细胞的代谢，并具有抗病毒、抗炎和抗真菌的特性。
Chinese.Notes: 民间疗法包括使用绿豆、甘草、黑豆和青葱与茶叶共同用于解毒目的。

Chinese: lao hu ban mao 老虎斑毛

English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of pregnancy. Symptoms of toxicity include burning sensation in the throat and mouth, dizziness, nausea, vomiting, pain in the abdomen area, frequent urination, burning sensation in the urinary tract, difficulty in urination, blood in urine, protein in urine, and in serious cases, kidney function exhaustion.
English.Research: Various studies indicate that the extract inhibits the metabolism of certain cancer cells and has antiviral, anti-inflammatory, and antifungal properties.
English.Notes: Folk therapy includes using mung bean, glycyrrhiza, black bean, and green onion with tea leaves for detoxification purposes.

Chinese.Preparation: 10 ~ 30 克。对于瘙痒的皮肤，白花蛇舌草 30 克，生地黄 15 克，土茯苓 12 克，加1磅的池塘泥鳅。对于消化道癌症或痔疮，使用白花蛇舌草、半枝莲和毛根煎剂。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在少数情况下，可能会出现过敏反应、身体不适、皮疹和瘙痒。可能会出现呼吸困难。
Chinese.Research: 可以激活网状内皮系统，增加淋巴细胞的吞噬作用。在高浓度下，制剂已显示抑制急性淋巴细胞白血病和急性粒细胞白血病的细胞。在阑尾炎和蛇咬伤的治疗中有效。
Chinese.Notes: 开始时剂量为10克，逐渐增加到30-60克。
Chemical Ingredients: E-6-0-对香豆酰甘露糖醇甲酯
6-O-对羟基肉桂酰甘露糖醇甲酯
6-O-P-美克酯肉桂酸甘露糖醇甲酯

English.Preparation: 10 ~ 30 g. For itchy skin, bai hua she she cao 30 g, sheng di huang 15 g, tu fu ling 12 g, add 1 pound of pond loach. For cancer of the digestive tract or hemorrhoids, make a decoction with bai hua she she cao, ban zhi lian, and mao gen.
English.Contraindications: In rare cases, allergic reactions of discomfort, rash, and itchiness may occur. Breathing difficulty may arise.
English.Research: Can activate reticuloendothelial system and increase phagocytosis by lymphocytes. In high concentrations, preparations have shown to inhibit cells from acute lymphocytic and acute granulocytic leukemia. Effective in treatment of appendicitis and snake bites.
English.Notes: Start with a small amount of 10 grams and gradually increase to 30-60 grams.

Maladies Treated: 产后脱发 (Baldness after giving birth)
Chinese.Preparation: 使用10克茯苓，煎汤，每天两次。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适合阴虚患者。过量使用可能会导致视力减弱。与身体慢性虚弱不兼容。在肾虚伴有尿失禁的情况下不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 茯苓复合物对70种不同类型的肿瘤有效，改善体重、食欲，并减少化疗的副作用。
Chinese.Notes: 阴虚情况下，需与其他草药平衡使用。

English.Preparation: Use 10 g of fu ling. Make into decoction. Twice a day.
English.Contraindications: Not suitable for patients with yinxu (yin deficient) condition. Over usage can weaken the eyes. Not compatible with chronic weakness of the body. Not to use in cases of shenxu (kidney deficient) with urinary incontinence.
English.Research: Fu ling compound was effective on 70 different types of tumors, improving body weight, appetite, and lessening side effects of chemotherapy.
English.Notes: Balance with other herbs in case of yinxu condition.

Maladies Treated: 血小板减少引起的紫癜
Chinese.Preparation: 6到12克
Chinese.Contraindications: 避免用于寒症、怀孕、月经过多、出血、阴虚伴随盗汗。与菟丝子、贝母、大黄和大蒜不相兼容。
Chinese.Research: 对循环的影响，抗微生物，抗炎，及对免疫系统的影响。对中枢神经系统的影响。当剂量增加时，对水和钠的分泌有影响。低剂量对钾分泌没有影响，高剂量时钾分泌减少。
Chinese.Notes: 现代用途包括治疗各种疾病，如紫癜和高血压。

Maladies Treated: Purpura due to low platelet count
English.Preparation: 6 to 12 g
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cold disorder, pregnancy, excessive menstruation, bleeding, yinxu (yin deficient) with night sweat. Not compatible with tu si zi, bei mu, da huang, and da suan.
English.Research: Effect on circulation, anti micro organism, anti inflammatory, and effect on immune system. Effect on CNS. Effect on secretion of water and sodium when dosage is increased. Low dosage does not have effect on secretion of potassium. At highest dosage secretion of potassium is decreased.
English.Notes: Modern applications include treatment for a variety of conditions such as purpura and hypertension.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：9-15克，煎煮。外用：适量，捣碎后涂抹。
Chinese.Notes: 化学成分包括百里香酚，香葱醇，柠檬烯，百里香醌，倍半萜烯，α-紫花前胡烯和甲基尤戈诺尔。

English.Preparation: Oral: 9 -15 g for decoction. External application: appropriate amount. Smash and apply.
English.Notes: Chemical ingredients include thymol, carvacrol, phellandrene, thymoquinone, bisabolene, α-caryophyllene, and methyleugenol.

Chinese.Preparation: 3~9克；治疗神经性皮炎：炭烧石榴皮1份，芝麻油2份。混合成糊状，刷于患处，每日两次。治疗口腔念珠菌感染：石榴皮10克，朋友大丸15克，加800毫升水煮45分钟。用煎剂漱口。
Chinese.Contraindications: 有时会导致恶心、呕吐、腹泻、头痛、头晕、耳鸣、下肢痉挛。长期使用可能导致肝小叶坏死、脂肪肝、肝硬化。不适合长期使用。过量使用可能引起严重症状，包括呼吸麻痹。
Chinese.Research: 水果的水酒提取物的毒性仅在较高的传统剂量下发生。水果提取物或成分可能抑制骨关节炎中的软骨降解。
Chinese.Notes: 此药草不应用于腹泻、腹痛、带血的痢疾，以及由急性感染引起的便秘。

English.Preparation: 3~9 g; For treatment of neurodermatitis: charred Pericarpium Granati 1 part, sesame oil 2 parts. Mix into paste and apply with a brush to affected area, twice a day. For treatment of trush: Pericarpium Granati 10 g, beng da wan 15 g, add 800 c.c. of water and simmer for 45 minutes. Rinse mouth with decoction.
English.Contraindications: Occasionally can cause nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, headache, dizziness, tinnitus, spasm in the lower legs. Long term usage can cause necrosis of the liver center lobule, fatty liver, cirrhosis. Not suitable for long term usage. Over dosage can cause serious symptoms including respiratory paralysis.
English.Research: Toxicity of the fruit hydroalcoholic extract only occurred at a higher traditional dosage. The fruit extract or compounds may inhibit cartilage degradation in osteoarthritis.
English.Notes: This herb should not be used in diarrhea, abdomen pain, dysentery with blood, and constipation caused by acute infection.

Maladies Treated: 下背部和膝关节的慢性疼痛
Chinese.Preparation: 12到15克煎剂。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适合具有热的阴虚患者。根据《本草经络》，此药不适合肾虚伴随高热者使用。如需使用，应与黄柏和知母配伍。
Chinese.Research: 医学功能包括对循环和免疫系统的影响，抗炎作用，镇静和麻醉作用，调节压力和子宫的作用，利尿作用，抗衰老作用，以及对各种细菌的抗生素作用。
Chinese.Notes: 现代应用包括治疗类风湿关节炎、坐骨神经痛和高血压。

Maladies Treated: Chronic pain in lower back and knees
English.Preparation: 12 to 15 g in decoction.
English.Contraindications: Not suitable for patients with yinxu (yin deficient) with heat. According to Ben Cao Jing Shu, this herb is not suitable for those who are kidney deficient with high heat. If to use it, it should be used with huang bai and zhi mu.
English.Research: Medical function includes effects on the circulatory and immune systems, anti-inflammatory effects, sedative and anesthesia effects, effects on stress and uterus, diuretic effects, anti-aging effects, and antibiotic effect against various bacteria.
English.Notes: Modern applications include treatment for rheumatoid arthritis, sciatica, and hypertension.

Chinese.Preparation: 每日3 ~ 9克
Chinese.Contraindications: 阴虚血亏及无气滞血瘀者不宜使用。孕妇慎用。
Chinese.Research: 降低血脂、抗血小板凝聚、保护心肌免受缺氧、保护肝脏免受毒素、抑制肝炎病毒复制、促进胆汁分泌、促进月经流动和缓解疼痛，具有抗肿瘤特性、抗炎特性、抗氧化，促进酒精代谢，同时具有抗生素和抗病毒作用，并帮助肠道蠕动。
Chinese.Notes: 请参阅姜黄、鬱金和二朔的辨别。

English.Preparation: 3 ~ 9 g per day
English.Contraindications: Not to use in case of yin deficient with losing blood and those without qi stagnation and blood stasis. Caution is advised for pregnant women.
English.Research: Lowers blood lipids, anti-coagulation of platelets, protects cardiac muscle from lack of oxygen, protects liver from toxins, against hepatitis virus replication, promotes bile secretion, promotes flow of menses and relieves pain, has anti-tumor properties, anti-inflammatory properties, antioxidation, promotes alcohol metabolism, and has antibiotic and antiviral effects while helping intestinal peristalsis.
English.Notes: See the differentiation of jiang huang, yu jin and e zhu.

Chinese.Preparation: 通常以生用形式使用。对于因肺热引起的咳嗽，应该使用用蜂蜜烘烤过的药材。剂量：3到9克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 注意：桑白皮是树皮。
Chinese.Research: 新鲜桑叶的煎剂在体外对金黄色葡萄球菌、β-溶血性链球菌及许多其他细菌具有抑制作用。饮用该煎剂可以抑制钩端螺旋体。
Chinese.Notes: 用于清热润肺，平喘。

English.Preparation: Normally used in raw form. For cough due to lung heat, those that have been baked with honey should be used. Dosage: 3 to 9 g.
English.Contraindications: Note: sang bai pi is the bark.
English.Research: Decoction of fresh sang ye possesses inhibiting effects on Staphylococcus aureus, β-Hemolytic streptococcus and many other kinds of bacteria in vitro. Consuming the decoction can inhibit Leptospira interrogans.
English.Notes: Used for getting rid of the heat in the lung to calm down wheezing.

Maladies Treated: 中枢神经系统类型的疟疾
Chinese.Preparation: 深肌注射：第一次200毫克，6到8小时后再注射100毫克；第2天和第3天各100毫克；总剂量500毫克。在严重情况下，第4天再给100毫克的剂量。或者每天使用300毫克，总计900毫克。小儿：15毫克/千克，持续3天。口服应用：第一次服用1克，然后在6到8小时后服用0.5克；在第2天和第3天，每天服用0.5克，持续3天；总剂量为2.5克。小儿：15毫克/千克，持续3天。
Chinese.Research: 在1970年代开发，因氯喹在疟疾治疗中产生耐药性。与氯喹结合使用时显著降低复发率。
Chinese.Notes: 青蒿素在传统中医中有着悠久的历史，用于治疗疟疾，其有效提取和使用始于1970年代初期。

English.Preparation: Deep muscle injection: first time 200 mg, 6 to 8 hours later, another 100 mg; 2nd and 3rd day 100 mg; total dosage 500 mg. In serious cases, another dosage of 100 mg on the 4th day. Or use daily of 300 mg per day, total of 900 mg. Small children: 15mg/kg for 3 days. Oral application: First take 1 g, then 0.5 g after 6 to 8 hours; on 2nd and 3rd day take 0.5g per day for 3 days; total dosage is 2.5 g. Small children: 15 mg/kg for 3 days.
English.Research: Developed during the 1970s after Chloroquine developed drug resistance in malaria therapy. Led to a significant reduction in relapse rates when combined with Chloroquine.
English.Notes: Qing hao su has a long history in traditional Chinese medicine for treating malaria, with its effective extraction and use beginning in the early 1970s.

Chinese.Preparation: 15克與水煮沸，加入適量糖以調味。每日分成3次服用。或與水製成丸劑，每次服用4克，每日3次。10天為一療程。對於慢性病，加入川芎9克、赤芍12克。尿中有血者加入生地、仙鶴草各15克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 此藥材可能引起腹瀉。懷孕期間不宜使用，或在熱性感染或脾虛伴腹瀉的情況下不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 從射幹中提取的植物雌激素對前列腺癌細胞在體外有抗增殖作用。
Chinese.Notes: 治療104名患者，94名康復，10名無效。在康復者中，9名在1至6個月內復發。

English.Preparation: 15 g boiled with water and add some sugar to taste. Make into 3 servings per day. Or make it into pills with water. Take 4 g each time, 3 times per day. 10 days is one therapy period. For chronic sickness, add chuan xiong 9 g, chi shao 12 g. For blood in the urine add sheng di, xian he cao 15 g each.
English.Contraindications: This herb may cause diarrhea. Not to use during pregnancy or in cases of heat infection, or in cases of spleen deficiency with diarrhea.
English.Research: Phytoestrogens derived from Belamcanda chinensis have an antiproliferative effect on prostate cancer cells in vitro.
English.Notes: Treated 104 patients with 94 healed and 10 not effective. Among the healed, 9 had relapses within 1 to 6 months.

Botanical: Coptis deltodea C.Y Cheng et Hsiao

Chinese.Preparation: 劑量：1.5 到 20 克；濃縮提取物：0.5 克到 2 克。用 5 毫克/毫升的黃連煎劑煮 1 小時可在體外殺死 99.8% 的幽門螺旋桿菌。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不應在風寒型感冒或流感及虛證的情況下使用。大劑量可有毒。不適用於葡萄糖-6-磷酸脱氫酶缺乏症患者。臨床經驗顯示可能出現潛在的毒性反應，包括急性缺氧、大腦過敏反應、暈眩、耳鳴、噁心、嘔吐、焦慮、呼吸急促、關節痛和腹瀉。
Chinese.Research: 研究表明黃連具有抗生素和抗阿米巴特性，對心臟和血液循環有影響，並能降低血糖。它還具有鈣通道阻滯劑的特性。
Chinese.Notes: 黃連屬於CITES管制物質，貿易需持有許可證。

Botanical: Coptis deltodea C.Y Cheng et Hsiao

Maladies Treated: Nose bleeding due to heat in blood
English.Preparation: Dosage: 1.5 to 20 g; Concentrated extract: 0.5 g to 2 g. Decoction of huang lian at 5 mg/ml for 1 hour kills 99.8% of H. pylori in vitro.
English.Contraindications: Not to be used in cases of wind cold type cold or flu and deficient type syndromes. Large dosage can be toxic. Not to use in patients with glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase deficiency. Clinical experience shows potential toxic reactions including acute deprivation of oxygen to the brain, allergic reactions, dizziness, tinnitus, nausea, vomiting, anxiety, shortness of breath, joint pain, and diarrhea.
English.Research: Research indicates huang lian has antibiotic and anti-amoeba properties, effects on heart and blood circulation, and can lower blood sugar. It also possesses calcium channel blocker properties.
English.Notes: Huang lian belongs to controlled material under CITES, requiring a permit for trade.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服，煎劑：3～10克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在氣虛或陰虛的情況下不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 現代研究顯示其具有多種藥理作用，包括抗炎和抗生素特性。

English.Preparation: Oral, for decoction: 3～10 g.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of qixu (qi deficient) or with yinxu (yin deficient).
English.Research: Modern research indicates various pharmacological effects including anti-inflammatory and antibiotic properties.

Maladies Treated: 胃部和太阳神经丛疼痛
Chinese.Preparation: 通常用量为9至12克。大剂量最高可达30克。生甘草是未经处理的甘草。炙甘草是用蜂蜜涂抹后烘烤的甘草。甘草梢是甘草的根尖或细根，煎汤时用量为1.5克到4.5克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 小剂量用作调和和协同药，而大剂量可能会提高血压。长期使用大剂量还可能导致水肿和低钾血症。与阿司匹林一起使用甘草可能会加重胃部刺激。
Chinese.Research: 甘草苷恢复烧伤区域周围组织中β-防御素的下降生成，改善烧伤小鼠对铜绿假单胞菌创伤感染的抵抗能力。此外，甘草苷可能对HBsAg具有剂量依赖性的抑制作用。
Chinese.Notes: 甘草梢用于治疗阴茎的感染和疼痛。炙甘草与蜂蜜一起准备时可改善消化和免疫系统功能。

English.Preparation: Normally 9 to 12 g. Large dosages can be up to 30 g. Sheng gan cao is untreated gan cao. Zhi gan cao is gan cao that has been coated with honey and baked. Gan cao shao is the tips of the root or fine roots of gan cao, used in decoction at 1.5 g to 4.5 g.
English.Contraindications: Small dosages are used as moderating and synergizing herbs while large dosages can increase blood pressure. Long term usage of large dosage can also cause edema and hypokalemia. Using gan cao with aspirin may increase the irritation of the stomach.
English.Research: Glycyrrhizin restores the impaired production of β-defensins in tissues surrounding burn areas and improves resistance of burn mice to Pseudomonas aeruginosa wound infection. Additionally, glycyrrhizin may have dose-dependent inhibition effects on HBsAg.
English.Notes: Gan cao shao is used for treating infection and pain in the penis. Zhi gan cao improves digestive and immune system functions when prepared with honey.
Chemical Ingredients: Licorice saponins A3, B2, C2, D3, F3, G2, H2, J2, K, K2

Maladies Treated: 由于慢性肝炎引起的肝区疼痛
Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：10到20克。浓缩提取物：0.5克到2克。煎煮后作为茶饮用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在气虚的情况下使用时需谨慎。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究发现没有详细介绍。
Chinese.Notes: 没有提供额外信息。

Maladies Treated: Pain in the liver area due to chronic hepatitis
English.Preparation: Dosage: 10 to 20 g. Concentrated extract: 0.5 g to 2 g. Make into decoction and use as tea.
English.Contraindications: Use caution in case of qi deficiency.
English.Research: Modern research findings are not detailed.
English.Notes: No additional information provided.

Chinese.Preparation: 用法：每次约10到20克。浸泡数小时至软化。去除羽毛。加入水并隔水炖煮数小时。可以加入鸡汤或鱼汤以增强味道。最好空腹服用（即，餐前至少一小时或餐后三小时）。
Chinese.Contraindications: 市场上有许多假货。假燕窝是用猪皮、塑料、海藻、木薯淀粉等有害材料制成的。许多所谓的“血燕”是用红色染料染色的，可能是有毒的。感染时不要使用。
Chinese.Notes: 与普遍认为的燕窝是凉性相反，它稍微偏温。没有任何中药经典提到它是凉性的。一些经典提到它是温性的。根据作者的经验，它是稍微温性的。色氨酸是一种必需氨基酸，化学式C11H12N2O2， 在消化过程中由蛋白质经蛋白酶（消化蛋白的酶）的作用形成。它对正常生长和发育是必需的，并且是几种物质的前体，包括血清素和烟酸。

English.Preparation: Usage: about 10 to 20 grams per serving. Soak a few hours until softened. Pick off feathers. Add water and double boil for several hours. Chicken soup stock or fish soup stock can be added to enhance taste. It is better to take on an empty stomach (i.e., at least one hour before or three hours after a meal).
English.Contraindications: There are many fake merchandise in the market. The fake birds' nest are made with pig's skin, plastic, sea weed, tapioca starch and other harmful material. Many so called 'blood birds' nests' are dyed with red dye and can be toxic. Do not use in case of infection.
English.Notes: Contrary to popular belief that birds' nest is cool, it is slightly warm. None of the Chinese herb classics mentioned it is cool. Some of them mentioned it is warm. According to the author's experience, it is slightly warm. Tryptophan is an essential amino acid, C11H12N2O2, formed from proteins during digestion by the action of proteolytic enzymes (an enzyme for digesting protein). It is necessary for normal growth and development and is the precursor of several substances, including serotonin and niacin.

Chinese.Preparation: 内服：煎汤10到15克。外用：与水煮沸。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在有脾虚、咳嗽和痰多的情况下，禁用。
Chinese.Research: 研究表明，黄精可能降低血压、血糖，减轻动脉硬化，改善心脏功能，并增强免疫系统调节等效果。
Chinese.Notes: 现代研究表明其抗衰老特性和在各种配方中的潜在应用。
Chemical Ingredients: 26-O-β-D-葡萄糖吡喃糖基-22-O-甲基-25(S)-氟甾-5-烯-3β
新白藜芦醇A 3-O-β-李曲四糖苷

Maladies Treated: Dry cough due to lung deficiency
English.Preparation: For internal consumption: 10 to 15 g for decoction. For external use: boil with water.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of pixu (spleen deficient) with cough and abundance of phlegm.
English.Research: Research indicates that Huang Jing may lower blood pressure, blood sugar, lessen arteriosclerosis, improve cardiac function, and enhance immune system regulation, among other benefits.
English.Notes: Modern studies suggest its anti-aging properties and potential in various formulations.
Chemical Ingredients: Spiral steroid olefinic alcohol type saponins

Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于霍乱、腹胀或因寒邪和虚弱导致的呕吐。
Chinese.Research: 毒性与注意事项

Maladies Treated: Vomiting due to heat in stomach
Helps neutralize toxin of bloat fish
English.Preparation: 15 to 30 g
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of cholera and bloating, or vomiting due to cold and deficiency.
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions

Botanical: 紫花葛根（Pueraria thunbergiana (S. et Z.) Benth.）
假毛葛根（Pueraria pseudohirsuta Tang et Wang）

Chinese.Preparation: 3到12克干草药；新鲜草药可用更高剂量。
Chinese.Contraindications: 可能会引起过敏反应，特别是在注射情况下。夏季多汗的情况下应避免使用。过量使用可能会损害消化功能。
Chinese.Research: 历史上用于治疗酗酒和醉酒。现代研究表明，它可以减少对酒精的上瘾并改善记忆功能，影响成骨细胞的分化和骨形成。
Chinese.Notes: 葛根素具有多种药理作用，包括肌肉放松、止泻作用以及对冠状血管的影响。

English.Preparation: 3 to 12 g of dried herb; fresh herb can be used at a higher dosage.
English.Contraindications: May cause allergic reactions, especially with injections. Avoid in cases of excessive sweating during summer. Overuse can impair digestive function.
English.Research: Historically used to treat alcohol abuse and drunkenness. Modern studies indicate it reduces addiction to alcohol and improves memory function, affecting osteoblast differentiation and bone formation.
English.Notes: Puerarin has various pharmacological actions including muscle relaxation, anti-diarrheal properties, and effects on coronary blood vessels.

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量为9 - 15克。对于水泡型肿瘤，天藻组合方包括60毫克天花粉和25毫克田藻胶研磨成细粉，然后装入胶囊中。每5至7天放入阴道一次。
Chinese.Contraindications: 孕妇及脾胃虚弱者禁用。大剂量和/或长期使用可能对肾脏有毒。
Chinese.Research: 天花粉可以增加冠状动脉血流，具有祛痰作用，并抑制蛋白质合成。它具有抗癌作用，并能显著减少胃酸分泌。
Chinese.Notes: 天花粉有多种应用，包括在低浓度下增强巨噬细胞活性，但在高浓度下长期使用会造成损害。
Chemical Ingredients: ∆-7-石竹烯醇-6'-(Z,z)-9,12-十八碳二烯酰-β-D-葡萄糖吡喃糖苷

English.Preparation: Dosage is 9 - 15 g. For hydatidiform tumor, tian zao combination formula includes 60mg of tian hua fen and 25 mg of ya zao jiao ground into fine powder and put into capsules. Insert into vagina once every 5 to 7 days.
English.Contraindications: Not to be used by pregnant women or in cases of spleen or stomach deficiency. Large dosages and/or long-term usage can be toxic to kidneys.
English.Research: Tian hua fen can increase coronary blood flow, has expectorant effects, and inhibits protein synthesis. It possesses anticancer effects and can significantly reduce gastric acid secretion.
English.Notes: Tian hua fen has a range of applications, including enhancing macrophage activity at low concentration, but can be damaging at high concentrations over extended periods.

Botanical: 蒙古艾 (Artemisia Scoparia Waldst. et Kitaib.)

Chinese.Preparation: 3到12克。如果热量过高，剂量可达24克。不要长时间煮沸。
Chinese.Contraindications: 产后妇女血虚或脾虚胃寒者不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 见青蒿素关于疟疾的治疗。
Chinese.Notes: 只有嫩叶有效。

English.Preparation: 3 to 12 g. If heat is high, the dosage can be up to 24 g. Do not boil for a long time.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in post partum women with blood deficiency or cold from pixu (spleen deficient with cold in the stomach).
English.Research: See qing hao su for malaria treatment.
English.Notes: Only the young leaves are effective.

Chinese.Preparation: 3-6克，常用于茶或煎剂。可以与其他草药结合用于各种治疗。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在阴虚内热的情况下使用时需谨慎。由于可能存在与八角茴香混合而导致的毒性污染，不建议用于婴儿。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明其对包括金黄色葡萄球菌和大肠杆菌在内的各种细菌可能具有抗生素效果。
Chinese.Notes: 八角茴香的主要挥发油成分主要是茴香脑，约占油含量的80-90%。

Maladies Treated: Chronic lower back pain with shenxu (kidney deficiency)
Vomiting due to coldness in stomach
English.Preparation: 3-6g, commonly used in tea or decoction. Can be combined with other herbs for various treatments.
English.Contraindications: Use with care in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with heat. Not advisable for infants due to potential toxic adulteration with Illicium anisatum.
English.Research: Modern studies indicate potential antibiotic effects against various bacteria including Staphylococcus aureus and Escherichia coli.
English.Notes: The main evaporating oil of star anise consists primarily of anethole, accounting for about 80-90% of the oil content.

Maladies Treated: 因湿热引起的关节疼痛
因湿热毒引起的浑浊尿液
肾脏的急性或慢性炎症
Chinese.Preparation: 煎剂：每日15克至30克。外用：制成粉末。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在肝肾阴虚的情况谨慎使用。不要与茶同服。
Chinese.Research: 土茯苓具有潜在的抗肿瘤效果，能抑制黄曲霉毒素以预防肝癌。然而，建议在使用土茯苓预防膀胱肿瘤时小心，因为它没有显著的抑制作用，可能诱发更多肿瘤。
Chinese.Notes: 现代应用包括慢性萎缩性 gastritis、血小板减少性紫癜、静脉炎、淋病、尿路感染、非感染性尿路综合症、痛经、卵巢纤维瘤和婴儿皮肤病。

Maladies Treated: Joint pain due to dampness and heat
Turbid urine due to damp heat toxin
Acute or chronic inflammation of kidneys
English.Preparation: For concoction: 15g to 30g per day. For external use: make into powder.
English.Contraindications: Use caution in cases of gan shen yin xu (liver-kidney yin deficient). Do not take with tea.
English.Research: Tu fu ling has potential anti-tumor effects and can inhibit aflatoxin to prevent liver cancer. However, caution is advised in using tu fu ling for bladder tumor prevention as it showed no significant inhibition and may induce more tumors.
English.Notes: Modern applications include chronic atrophic gastritis, thrombocytopenic purpura, phlebitis, gonorrhea, urinary tract infections, non-infection type of urinary tract syndrome, painful menses, fibroids in the ovaries, and skin disease in babies.

Chinese.Contraindications: 长期使用或使用大量可能对肾脏有毒。
Chinese.Research: 强烈抑制淋巴细胞增殖活性。
Chemical Ingredients: 含有碳原子数为22-30的羧酸

Maladies Treated: Weakness in the arms and legs
English.Contraindications: Long term usage or using large amount can be toxic to the kidneys.
English.Research: Strong lymphocyte proliferation inhibitory activity.
Chemical Ingredients: carboxylic acid with carbon atom number of 22-30

Chinese.Preparation: 煮夏枯草1000克以制取提取物。反复三次。混合批次，加入蜂蜜，煮成糊状。对于急性扁桃体炎：煮30-60克夏枯草并过滤，全天使用。对于汤剂：根据各种病症与其他草药混合。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在脾虚情况下使用应谨慎。长期使用可能引起胃部刺激。如有必要进行长期使用，建议添加当参和白术。可能对肝脏有毒。
Chinese.Research: 动物研究表明，夏枯草可以减缓动脉硬化，降低血脂，并对心血管疾病治疗具有良好效果。具有利尿、抗生素、抗真菌和抗炎作用。
Chinese.Notes: 推荐局部应用于单纯疱疹I型和II型。可能会升高ALT和AST水平，表示潜在的肝毒性。

Maladies Treated: Coughing blood due to TB of the lungs
Pain and ache of the muscles and bones
English.Preparation: Boil xia ku cao 1000 g to make extract. Repeat 3 times. Mix batches, add honey, boil into paste. For acute tonsillitis: boil xia ku cao 30-60 g and strain, use it through the day. For decoction: mix with other herbs as specified for various ailments.
English.Contraindications: Use caution in cases of spleen deficiency. Long-term usage can cause stomach irritation. Adding dang shen and bai zhu is recommended if long-term use is necessary. Can be toxic to the liver.
English.Research: Animal studies showed that xia ku cao can slow down arterial sclerosis, lower blood lipids, and have favorable results in treating cardiovascular diseases. It has diuretic, antibiotic, antifungal, and anti-inflammatory effects.
English.Notes: Topical application is recommended for herpes simplex I & II. Can raise ALT and AST levels, indicating potential liver toxicity.

Botanical: 日本苍术 (Atractylodes japonica Koidz. Kitam)

Chinese.Preparation: 将苍术在水中煨煮以释放香气，可以帮助去除真菌和细菌。典型剂量为10到20克；浓缩提取物为0.5到2克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在阴虚伴热和/或气虚伴汗的情况下不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 利尿效果并不明显，但可以增加尿液中钠、钾和氯离子的分泌。苍术的酒精提取物可以在正常兔子中维持血糖下降。
Chinese.Notes: 苍术在传统医学中有多种应用，包括治疗消化不良和头痛等多种病症，并且已研究其药理学效果。

English.Preparation: Simmering cang zhu in water to release fragrance can help in getting rid of fungi and bacteria. Typical dosage is 10 to 20 g; concentrated extract 0.5 to 2 g.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in case of yinxu (yin deficient) with heat and/or sweaty with qixu (qi deficient).
English.Research: The diuretic effect is not obvious but it can increase the secretion ions of sodium, potassium, and chlorine in urine. Alcohol extract of cang zhu can maintain lowering of blood sugar in regular rabbits.
English.Notes: Cang zhu has various applications in traditional medicine including treatment for multiple conditions like poor digestion and headaches, and it has been researched for its pharmacological effects.

Chinese.Preparation: 每日6~12克
Chinese.Contraindications: 偶爾可能會出現噁心、嘔吐、食慾不振、脹氣，但它是無毒的。消化功能弱或懷孕期間者不應使用。
Chinese.Research: 1. 抗生素效果 2. 降低血壓 3. 呼吸系統疾病的治療和預防 4. 外用於慢性宮頸炎

Maladies Treated: Red eyes caused by wind fire
English.Preparation: 6~12 g per day
English.Contraindications: Occasional nausea, vomiting, lack of appetite, flatulence may arise but it is non-toxic. Those with weak digestion or during pregnancy should not use it.
English.Research: 1. Antibiotic effect 2. Lower blood pressure 3. Treatment and prevention of respiratory diseases 4. External use for chronic cervicitis

Botanical: Magnolia officinalis Rehd. et Wils. ssp. biloba

Chinese.Contraindications: 怀孕期间需谨慎使用。与泽泻和寒水石相对抗。大剂量和/或长期使用可能对肾脏有毒。
Chinese.Research: 其中一种活性化学成分，厚朴酚，可以引起淋巴细胞白血病的B细胞发生凋亡。厚朴酚不易被消化系统破坏。它在煎剂中可能有效。
Chinese.Notes: 配方样本包括厚朴三物汤和达成汤。
Chemical Ingredients: 1-(4-羟基-3-甲氧基酚)-2-(4-(W-羟基丙基)-2-甲氧基酚氧)丙烷-1,3-二醇

Botanical: Magnolia officinalis Rehd. et Wils. ssp. biloba

English.Preparation: 3-12 g; hou pu hua (flower): 3-6 g
English.Contraindications: Use caution during pregnancy. It antagonizes ze xie and han shui shi. Large dosages and/or long term usage can be toxic to kidneys.
English.Research: One of the active chemicals, honokiol, can cause B-cells of lymphocytic leukemia into apoptosis. Honokiol does not get destroyed by the digestive system readily. It can be effective in decoction.
English.Notes: Samples of formulae include hou pu san wu tang and da cheng tang.

Maladies Treated: 自身免疫系统和结缔组织疾病
Chinese.Preparation: 内服1-3克。为止嗝，用2克丁香和2克石榴煮成汤剂，一天分为2次服用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 大剂量可对肾脏有毒。
Chinese.Research: 丁香 (Eugenia caryophyllata) 精油显示出对白色念珠菌、黑曲霉和黄曲霉显著的抗真菌活性。诸如倍半萜等化合物可能作为潜在的抗癌剂。它可以通过增强体液免疫和降低细胞介导免疫来调节免疫反应。
Chinese.Notes: 丁香的花和果实均具有药用属性。
Chemical Ingredients: 乙酰丁香酚 (丁香酚乙酸酯)

Maladies Treated: Auto-immune system and connective tissue diseases
English.Preparation: 1-3 g for internal use. For hiccups, make a decoction with 2 g of ding xiang and 2 g of shi di, administered in 2 servings for one day dosage.
English.Contraindications: Large dosages can be toxic to the kidneys.
English.Research: Eugenia caryophyllata essential oil exhibited significant antifungal activity against Candida albicans, Aspergillus niger, and Aspergillus flavus. Compounds such as sesquiterpenes may serve as potential anticarcinogenic agents. It can modulate the immune response by augmenting humoral immunity and decreasing cell-mediated immunity.
English.Notes: Both the flowers and fruits of ding xiang (cloves) have medicinal properties.

Botanical: Lycopus lucidus Turcz. var. hirtus Regel
Lycopus lucidus Turcz. var. taiwanensis Hayata

Chinese.Preparation: 10到20克，浓缩提取物：0.5到2克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在怀孕或无瘀血的情况下使用时需谨慎。泽兰（Eupatorium fortunei Turcz.）和佩兰（Eupatorium japonicum Thunb.）在某些省份常常混用。这些是不同的草药，应用也不同。
Chinese.Research: 根据陕西中医药研究院的谢仁明等研究者，泽兰可用于减轻四氯化碳造成的肝脏损伤。它可以降低实验小鼠的SGOT（AST）和SGPT（ALT），后者是通过给予小鼠四氯化碳得出的结果。
Chinese.Notes: Eupatorium adenophorum Spreng并不是用于中国草药的同种植物。它源自中美洲和墨西哥，对农业有害。

Botanical: Lycopus lucidus Turcz. var. hirtus Regel
Lycopus lucidus Turcz. var. taiwanensis Hayata

English.Preparation: 10 to 20 g, concentrated extract: 0.5 to 2 g.
English.Contraindications: Use with caution in cases of pregnancies or cases without blood stasis. The use of ze lan (Eupatorium fortunei Turcz.) and pei lan (Eupatorium japonicum Thunb) are often intermixed in certain provinces. These are different herbs with different applications.
English.Research: Ze lan can be used to mitigate the damage of the liver caused by carbon tetrachloride, according to researchers Xie Renming et al at Shaanxi Traditional Chinese Medical School of Shaanxi TCM Research Institute. It can lower SGOT (AST) and SGPT (ALT) of laboratory mice that were given carbon tetrachloride.
English.Notes: Eupatorium adenophorum Spreng is not the same plant used in Chinese herb medicine. It originated from Central America and Mexico and is harmful to husbandry.

Chinese.Preparation: 6到12克。大剂量可达24克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在脾虚或肾虚情况下及孕期禁用。在早期怀孕时可引起流产。
Chinese.Research: 甲基3,4-二羟基苯甲酸甲酯显示出强效的抗怀孕活性，给予怀孕大鼠200μg/kg可以终止怀孕。

English.Preparation: 6 to 12 g. Large dosage can be up to 24 g.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in case of pixu (spleen deficient) or shenxu (kidney deficient) or during pregnancy. In early stages of pregnancy it can induce an abortion.
English.Research: methyl 3,4-dihydroxybenzoate showed potent anti-pregnancy activity, given 200 μg/kg to pregnant rat can terminate pregnancy at its early stage of pregnancy.

Maladies Treated: 因关节炎和瘫痪导致的关节疼痛
Chinese.Preparation: 煎剂：4克~12克。 粉末形式：2克到4克。 浓缩提取物：0.5~2克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 大量使用可能有毒。症状包括头痛、头晕、心悸、呼吸困难，血压最初升高然后降低；有时消化道可能出现出血。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究强调了大量用量的毒性和相关的注意事项。

Maladies Treated: painful joints due to arthritis and paralysis
English.Preparation: For decoction: 4 g ~ 12 g. In powder form: 2 g to 4 g. Concentrated extract: 0.5 ~ 2 g.
English.Contraindications: Large amounts can be toxic. Symptoms include headache, dizziness, palpitation, difficulty in breathing, and initially the blood pressure goes up and then goes down; sometimes the digestive tract may show bleeding.
English.Research: Modern research highlights toxicity and cautions associated with large dosages.

Chinese.Preparation: 根、树皮和果实：每天6到15克。叶子可作为蔬菜使用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于外热、脾虚伴湿、腹泻或腹泻的情况。与华法林和枸杞同时使用时，观察到INR值增加。
Chinese.Research: 研究表明，枸杞能够改善和调节免疫系统，具有抗衰老特性，可能增强记忆。它已被证明可保护肝功能并降低血脂。
Chinese.Notes: 在中国，宁夏的枸杞被认为是最好的。常用的叶子可作为汤菜出售。
Chemical Ingredients: 槲皮素-鼠李糖-二-半乳糖苷
二咖啡酰奎宁酸异构体
槲皮素-二-(鼠李-半乳糖苷)
槲皮素-二-(鼠李)-半乳糖苷

English.Preparation: Root, bark, and fruit: 6 to 15 g per day. Leaves are used as a vegetable.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of external heat, spleen deficiency with dampness, loose stool, or diarrhea. An increased INR value was noted with concurrent use of warfarin and qi zi.
English.Research: Research indicates that Lycium barbarum improves and regulates the immune system, exhibits anti-aging properties, and may enhance memory. It has been shown to protect liver function and lower blood lipids.
English.Notes: In China, gou qi zi from Ningxia province is considered the best. Commonly used leaves can be sold as soup vegetables.

Chinese.Contraindications: 在阴虚的情况下使用时需谨慎。
Chinese.Research: 提取的白术显示出保护肝脏和改善胆汁分泌的作用。具有利尿特性，增强免疫系统，并表现出抗癌效果。
Chinese.Notes: 白术常用于传统的肠胃健康配方中。

English.Preparation: 5 to 15 g; Concentrated extract: 0.5 to 2 g.
English.Contraindications: Use caution in cases of yinxu (yin deficiency).
English.Research: Extraction of bai zhu was shown to protect the liver and improve gall secretion. It has diuretic properties, enhances the immune system, and exhibits anti-cancer effects.
English.Notes: Bai zhu is often used in traditional formulas for gastrointestinal health.

Chinese.Preparation: 果实: 1.5～3克; 叶: 外用。适量使用。捣碎后敷于患处。子: 1–3钱; 叶适量外用，新鲜叶子捣碎后敷于患处。

English.Preparation: Fruit: 1.5～3g; Leaves: external use. Use appropriate amount. Smash and apply to affected area. Sub: 1–3錢; Leaves for external use in appropriate amount, fresh leaves crushed and applied to affected area.

Maladies Treated: 因宫颈阻塞引起的血液潴留
Chinese.Preparation: 煎剂用量：6到10克，或制成丸剂或粉末形式。也可用酒浸泡后饮用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 孕妇、月经过多及遗精者禁用。
Chinese.Research: 该草药对子宫、血液循环、代谢和免疫系统表现出效果。其提取物可以放松豚鼠和猫的子宫，在实验小鼠中具有100%的抗妊娠效果，并促进大鼠从肝炎中恢复。

English.Preparation: For decoction: 6 to 10 g, or use in pills or in powder form. It can be used for soaking in alcohol for drinking.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in case of pregnancy, excess bleeding during menstruation and spermatorrhea.
English.Research: The herb has shown effects on the uterus, blood circulation, metabolism, and immune system. Its extract can relax the uterus in guinea pigs and cats, has a 100% anti-pregnancy rate in lab mice, and promotes liver recovery from hepatitis in rats.

Botanical: Ziziphus jujuba var. Spinosa (Bunge) Hu ex H. F. Chow

Chinese.Contraindications: 在慢性腹泻或因慢性支气管炎、酵母或细菌感染引起的焦虑情况下谨慎使用。
Chinese.Research: 待加载

Botanical: Ziziphus jujuba var. Spinosa (Bunge) Hu ex H. F. Chow

English.Preparation: 10–20g. Concentrated extract: 0.5-2g.
English.Contraindications: Use with caution in case of chronic diarrhea, or in case of anxiety due to chronic bronchitis, yeast or bacterial infection.
English.Research: to be loaded

Chinese.Preparation: 干木材10到20克或浓缩提取物0.5到2克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于血虚和无血瘀的情况。孕妇禁止使用。市场上有假苏木，通常是染色的木材。
Chinese.Research: 使用苏木可以明显延长移植心脏的寿命。进一步观察表明，苏木可以抑制T细胞毒素，并减少宿主排斥反应。
Chinese.Notes: 关于市场上假苏木的警告，这可能会影响其使用。

English.Preparation: 10 to 20 g of dried wood or concentrated extract of 0.5 to 2 g.
English.Contraindications: Not suitable in cases of blood deficiency and without blood stasis. Not to use in cases of pregnancy. There are fake su mu in the market, which are dyed wood.
English.Research: Using su mu can distinctly prolong the life span of transplanted heart. Further observations indicate that su mu can inhibit T cell toxin and reduce the host rejection reaction.
English.Notes: Cautions about fake su mu in the market which may affect its use.

Chinese.Preparation: 用量：1 ~ 3 錢（3.75 克），約 4 到 11 克。可用於艾灸或製成湯劑。
Chinese.Contraindications: 對於陰虛或血熱的情況要小心使用。有效成分是揮發油，口服時可能會導致皮膚炎和消化道刺激。
Chinese.Research: 研究表明，使用艾葉進行艾灸對某些細菌具有顯著效果，包括β-溶血性鏈球菌、肺炎鏈球菌和金黃色葡萄球菌。
Chinese.Notes: 在艾灸中，應使用超過一年存放的舊艾葉，因為其精油含量較低，使其更安全。
Chemical Ingredients: 揮發油：α-酚菊烯、樟腦、α-雪松烯、反式-卡維歐、樟腦乙酸酯、艾美醇、異樟腦、α-松油醇、β-桂皮烯、卡維酮、卡芬烯、杉木醇
三萜類：α-氨瑞、β-氨瑞、炸瑞精
其他：黃酮醇、艾馬利酮、β-谷甾醇、矽、無機元素

English.Preparation: Dosage: 1 ~ 3 qian (3.75 grams), approximately 4 to 11 grams. Can be used for moxibustion or prepared as a decoction.
English.Contraindications: Use caution in case of yin deficiency or blood heat. The effective ingredient is the volatile oil, which can cause inflammation of the skin and digestive tract irritation when taken orally.
English.Research: Studies show that moxibustion with ai ye can have significant effects against certain bacteria, including β-Hemolytic streptococcus, Pneumonococcus, and Staphylococcus aureus.
English.Notes: When used in moxibustion, stale ai ye older than one year should be used due to its lower essential oil content, which makes it safer.
Chemical Ingredients: Volatile oils: alpha-phellandrene, camphene, alpha-cedrene, trans-carveol, bornyl acetate, elemol, isoborneol, alpha-terpineol, beta-caryophyllene, carvone, cadinene, thujyl alcohol
Others: flavone alcohol, eupatilin, beta-sitosterol, silicon, non-organic elements

Maladies Treated: 类风湿性关节炎伴随手臂酸痛
Chinese.Contraindications: 对血虚或阴虚或肝阳上亢综合症患者禁忌。
Chinese.Research: 强调了特定情况下的毒性和注意事项。
Chinese.Notes: 注意可以根据特定情况如牙痛使用额外成分。

English.Preparation: 4 to 12 g.
English.Contraindications: Contra-indicated to those with blood deficiency or yin deficiency or with liver yang ascending syndromes.
English.Research: Toxicity & cautions are highlighted regarding specific conditions.
English.Notes: Noted that additional ingredients can be used for specific conditions like toothache.

Chinese.Preparation: 治療水腫：蠶豆 60 克，冬瓜皮 60 克。用水煮沸后口服。
Chinese.Contraindications: 有家族性蠶豆症（缺乏葡萄糖-6-磷酸脱氢酶）的人不應食用蠶豆。脾虛者不宜多吃。
Chinese.Research: 少數人群有先天性生化缺陷與食用蠶豆有關，這導致急性溶血性貧血。毒性研究表明，其根部含有可能對骨髓和消化上皮有害的物質。
Chinese.Notes: 豆莢、花和葉被用於止血。花也被用於降低血壓。

English.Preparation: For treatment of edema: can dou 60 g, dong gua pi 60 g. Boil with water and take orally.
English.Contraindications: Those with family history of favism (lack of glucose 6 - phosphate dehydrogenase) should not eat fava beans. Those with spleen deficiency should not eat too much.
English.Research: A small percentage of the population have a congenital biochemical defect associated with fava beans that leads to acute hemolytic anemia. Toxicity research has shown that the root contains substances that can be harmful to bone marrow and digestive epithelium.
English.Notes: The pods, flowers, and leaves are used in arresting bleeding. Flowers are also being used in lowering blood pressure.

Chinese.Preparation: 每日剂量：9到30克。样本准备包括感染的茶和习惯性便秘的粉末。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不宜在脾胃湿阻无热或因脾虚导致的腹泻情况下使用。可能与黄芪、干姜、大枣、梨露、苦参和山茱萸相克。
Chinese.Research: 待上传
Chinese.Notes: 该草药的组合可能增强效果；可能引发心率不齐。

English.Preparation: Dosage per day: 9 to 30 g. Sample preparations include tea for infection and powder for habitual constipation.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of spleen or stomach dampness without heat, or diarrhea due to pixu. May be incompatible with huang qi, gan jiang, da zao, li lu, ku shen, and shan zhu yu.
English.Research: to be uploaded
English.Notes: Combinations of the herb may intensify effects; may trigger irregular heart rate.

Chinese.Preparation: 内服：磨碎后与水冲服：6到15克；煎剂：30到120克，或制成丸剂或粉剂。外用：与水研磨后涂抹在患处。
Chinese.Contraindications: 少数患者在服用此药后可能会出现胃部不适、腹胀、腹泻、恶心或失眠。孕妇禁用。无热或脾虚者禁用。
Chinese.Research: 该草药有时作为犀牛角的替代品，犀牛角在商业上是非法的。
Chinese.Notes: 水牛角被用作犀牛角的替代品，而犀牛角是禁止交易的。

English.Preparation: Internal consumption with grinding with water: 6 to 15 g. In decoction: 30 to 120 g, or make into pill or powder form. External use: grind with water and apply to affected areas.
English.Contraindications: A small number of patients may experience stomach discomfort, flatulence, diarrhea, nausea, or insomnia after taking this herb. Not to use during pregnancy. Not to use where there is no heat or in cases of spleen deficiency.
English.Research: This herb is sometimes used as a substitute for rhino horn, which is illegal for commerce.
English.Notes: Water buffalo horn is used as a substitute for rhino horn which is prohibited from trade.

Chinese.Preparation: 各种制备包括生半夏（生）、青半夏（浸泡在铝土水中）、姜半夏（浸泡在生姜和铝中）、法半夏（浸泡在甘草和石灰中）和半夏曲（由法半夏发酵而成的饼干）。剂量范围为每天4.5到12克，或浓缩提取物每天0.5到2克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 对任何因阴虚导致的咳血或肝病患者不宜使用。热症患者应谨慎使用。生半夏非常有毒。
Chinese.Research: 这种草药表现出抗呕吐、抗肾炎、祛痰和抗痉挛效果。它含有毒性化合物，如氯化阿米替林。
Chinese.Notes: 半夏对肝脏有毒。解毒剂包括生姜汁和其他草药 decoction 以解毒。

English.Preparation: Various preparations include Sheng ban xia (raw), Qing ban xia (soaked in alum water), Jiang ban xia (soaked in ginger and alum), Fa ban xia (soaked in gan cao and lime), and Ban xia qu (fermented cookie made from fa ban xia). Dosage ranges from 4.5 to 12 g, or concentrated extract from 0.5 to 2 g per day.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in any cough with bleeding due to yinxu or in those with liver diseases. Use caution in cases of heat. Raw ban xia is very toxic.
English.Research: The herb exhibits anti-vomiting, anti-nephritis, expectorant, and anti-convulsant effects. It contains toxic compounds like coniine.
English.Notes: Ban xia is toxic for the liver. An antidote involves sheng jiang (raw ginger) juice and other herbal decoctions to detoxify.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服煎剂：15到30克。外用时，使用适量。捣碎后涂抹于受影响区域。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在脾虚且没有血瘀的情况下，不要使用。
Chinese.Research: 大薊炭（大薊炭）是经过切割、在阳光下干燥并炒至深色的草药，保留了草药的特性。其止血功能更强。

English.Preparation: Take orally as decoction: 15 to 30 g. For external application, use an appropriate amount. Smash and apply to affected areas.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of pixu (spleen deficient) and without blood stasis.
English.Research: Da ji tan (da ji charcoal) is the herb that has been cut, dried under the sun and stir-fried till dark, preserving the property of the herb. Its function of arresting bleeding is stronger.

Botanical: 弱筋藤 Aristolochia debilis Sieb et Zucc

Chinese.Preparation: 3到10克煎汤使用。外用适量：用水煮沸后用于洗涤受影响部位。
Chinese.Contraindications: 对因寒虚或虚弱而引起的咳嗽不宜使用。对因脾虚引起的腹泻不宜使用。大剂量和长期使用可能对肾脏造成损害，并可能致命。孕妇禁用。
Chinese.Research: 根据加利福尼亚的一项研究，标记为Akebia trifoliata Koiz. var. australis Rehd.的草药实际上是弱筋藤，含有马兜玲酸。
Chinese.Notes: 广防己属于马兜铃科，对肾脏有毒。30克为毒性剂量。

English.Preparation: 3 to 10 g in decoction. Use appropriate amount for external use: boil with water and use for washing affected parts.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cough due to cold and deficiency or weakness. Do not use in diarrhea due to pixu (spleen deficiency). Large dosage and long term usage can cause damage to kidneys and can be lethal. Do not use in cases of pregnancy.
English.Research: According to a study in California, the herbs labeled as Akebia trifoliata Koiz. var. australis Rehd. are actually Aristolochia debilis, which contain aristolochia acid.
English.Notes: Guang fang ji belongs to the aristolochiae family and is toxic for the kidneys. 30 g is the toxic dosage.

Chinese.Preparation: 3至7克为粉末；9至15克用于煎剂。
Chinese.Contraindications: 若由急性感染引起的感冒或流感感染导致的喘息和咳嗽，禁止使用。
Chinese.Research: 蛤蚧提取物对HepG02肝癌细胞的生长具有抑制作用。
Chinese.Notes: 广西桂林的蛤蚧被认为是最好的。
Chemical Ingredients: 甲基对磷酸酯GSH S-甲基转移酶

English.Preparation: 3 to 7 g as powder; 9 to 15 g in decoction.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in case of wheezing and coughing from cold or flu infection due to acute infection.
English.Research: The extract of ge jie possesses the effect of inhibition toward the growth of liver cancer cell of HepG02.
English.Notes: Geckos from Guilin of Guangxi are considered the best.

Maladies Treated: 因肺阴虚而引起的慢性咳嗽
因外感风寒而引起的咳嗽
Chinese.Preparation: 5到10克煎服。
Chinese.Contraindications: 紫菀不能与附子、草乌、菊麦、雷丸、远志同用；与阴沉浩相克。阴虚有热的咳嗽、咳血的患者，及有热的咳嗽者，均不宜单独使用紫菀。
Chinese.Research: 煎剂和提取物能够化痰、止咳，并抑制细菌如大肠杆菌、志贺氏痢疾杆菌等。

Maladies Treated: chronic cough due to lung yin deficiency
cough due to exterior wind cold
cough with difficulty in expelling phlegm
cough and spitting pus and blood
English.Preparation: 5 to 10 g in decoction.
English.Contraindications: Do not use zi wan with fu zi, cao wu, ju mai, lei wan, yuan zhi; and it is incompatible with yin chen hao. Those who cough, and coughing blood due to yinxu (yin deficient) with high heat, and those who have cough with heat, do not use zi wan by itself.
English.Research: The decoction and extract can expel phlegm, soothe cough, and inhibit bacteria such as E. coli, Shigella dysenteriae, and others.

Chinese.Preparation: 内服煎剂：15到30克。外用：适量使用。用煎剂清洗受影响区域。
Chinese.Contraindications: 毒性症状：消化系统刺激，如：呕吐、腹痛、腹泻、尿中带血等。
Chinese.Research: 通过高效液相色谱法测定Polyogonum flaccidum Meisn中的没食子酸。没食子酸的平均回收率为100.7%，相对标准偏差为1.0%（n=6）。该方法简便、快速、准确，适合于Polygonum flaccidum的质量控制。
Chinese.Notes: 无明显生殖器疾病但由下丘脑-垂体-性腺轴功能失调引起的阴道出血在中文中叫做'功能病' (功能病)。

English.Preparation: For decoction for oral intake: 15 to 30 g. For external use: use appropriate amount. Wash affected area with decoction.
English.Contraindications: Symptoms of toxicity: irritation in the digestive system, like: vomiting, pain in abdomen, diarrhea, blood in urine etc.
English.Research: Determination of Gallic Acid in Polygonum Flaccidum Meisn by HPLC. The average recovery rate of Gallic acid was 100.7%, RSD was 1.0% (n=6). The method is simple, quick, and accurate, suitable for quality control of Polygonum flaccidum.
English.Notes: Vaginal bleeding, with no obvious sexual organ disease but caused by hypothalamic-pituitary-gonadal axis dysfunction, is called 'gong xue bing' (功能病) in Chinese.

Chinese.Preparation: 内服：12到19克。外用：不限。便秘时：羊蹄8克，甘草3克，水300毫升。煮至150毫升。口服。
Chinese.Contraindications: 它含有草酸。使用大量可能对肾脏有毒。外用不应以羊蹄替代大黄。
Chinese.Research: Chang Li等人对Rumex confertus Willd.的化学成分研究。
Chinese.Notes: 尽管羊蹄也称为土大黄，但土大黄并不是大黄。外用不能用大黄替代。

English.Preparation: To take internally: 12 to 19 grams. External use: no limit. For constipation: yang ti 8 g, gan cao 3 g, water 300 cc. Boil down to 150 cc. Take orally.
