Chinese.Notes: 又名：蓯蓉，大芸，淡大芸，甜大芸，寸芸，梭梭大芸，管花肉蓯蓉，盐生肉蓯蓉，沙蓯蓉，白花盐蓯蓉，草蓯蓉。

Maladies Treated: Yeast infection from cold deficient womb
Bleeding of the kidneys and/or bladder
English.Preparation: 9 to 21 g
English.Contraindications: Not to use in case of diarrhea due to spleen deficiency. Not to use in patients with heat signs.
English.Notes: Also known as: 蓯蓉, 大芸, 淡大芸, 甜大芸, 寸芸, 梭梭大芸, 管花肉蓯蓉, 鹽生肉蓯蓉, 沙蓯蓉, 白花鹽蓯蓉, 草蓯蓉.

Chinese.Preparation: 用于慢性腹泻：将荠菜风干，制成粉末。每次使用6克，配以红枣煎剂。
Chinese.Contraindications: 孕妇及哺乳期禁用。心肺疾病患者使用时须谨慎。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明潜在毒性和使用时的必要谨慎。

English.Preparation: For chronic diarrhea: air dry ji cai. Make into powder. Use 6 g each time with decoction of hong zao.
English.Contraindications: Not to use during pregnancy or during breastfeeding. Use with care in patients with heart and lung diseases.
English.Research: Modern research indicates potential toxicity and necessary cautions for use.

Chinese.Preparation: 捣碎后外用。如口服，需注意其毒性极强，必须小心使用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 植物的所有部位（叶子、根、种子）均有毒。中毒症状包括食欲不振、恶心、呕吐、腹痛、腹泻、呼吸困难、皮肤淤青、循环衰竭和少尿、溶血、血尿及呼吸窒息，可能导致死亡。治疗方法包括催吐、胃洗、泻下及注射生理盐水或5%葡萄糖溶液。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究强调该植物毒性极高，特别是在口服使用时需谨慎处理。
Chinese.Notes: 主要外用。
Chemical Ingredients: N,N-二甲基色氨酸甲基化酯

English.Preparation: Smash and apply externally. If taken orally, be aware it is very toxic and must be used with care.
English.Contraindications: All parts of the plant (leaves, roots, seeds) are toxic. Poisoning symptoms include poor appetite, nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, diarrhea, difficulty in breathing, skin bruising, circulatory failure and oliguria, hemolysis, hematuria, and respiratory suffocation, potentially leading to death. Treatment methods include vomiting induction, gastric lavage, catharsis, and injection of saline or 5% glucose solution.
English.Research: Modern research highlights that the plant is highly toxic and requires careful handling, especially in oral administration.
English.Notes: Mainly used externally.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服，煎剂 9 - 15 克。外用：用水煮沸后清洗受影响区域。
Chinese.Contraindications: 心脏病患者和孕妇应避免使用。应避免在寒冷和月经期间使用。
Chinese.Research: 地枫皮有两种类型：一种叫南宁地枫皮，历史上作为地枫皮使用，而另一种是桂林地枫皮，来自可能导致严重中毒的假替代品。
Chinese.Notes: 南宁地枫皮与其掺假品相比具有明显的物理特征。

Maladies Treated: Abdominal pain due to qi stagnation
English.Preparation: Take orally, in decoction 9 - 15 g. External application: boil with water and use it to wash affected areas.
English.Contraindications: Heart patients and pregnant women should avoid use. Should not be used during cold and menstruation periods.
English.Research: There are two types of di feng pi: one is called Nanning di feng pi, which is historically used as di feng pi, while the other is Guilin di feng pi, which comes from false substitutes that may cause serious poisoning.
English.Notes: Nanning di feng pi has distinct physical characteristics compared to its adulterated counterparts.

Maladies Treated: 红肿疼痛眼睛（Red swollen painful eyes）
Chinese.Preparation: 10-15 克，煎煮并用作茶饮。
Chinese.Contraindications: 如腹泻、感冒或流感时不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明，对于几种眼部疾病和高血压的治疗具有特定作用和指示。

English.Preparation: 10-15 grams, prepare as a decoction and use as tea.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in case of diarrhea, cold or influenza.
English.Research: Modern research indicates specific actions and indications for treatment of several eye conditions and hypertension.

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：6到15克
Chinese.Contraindications: 可能存在毒性和注意事项；有关使用的建议请参考医疗指导。
Chinese.Research: 近期研究聚焦于从植物中分离和鉴定化合物，尤其涉及皂苷和内酯。
Chinese.Notes: 临床应用主要涉及治疗与细菌感染和胃肠问题相关的疾病。

English.Preparation: Dosage: 6 to 15 g
English.Contraindications: Toxicity and cautions may apply; refer to medical guidance for usage.
English.Research: Recent studies focus on the isolation and identification of compounds derived from the plant, particularly concerning saponins and lactones.
English.Notes: Clinical applications primarily involve treating conditions associated with bacterial infections and gastrointestinal issues.

Chinese.Contraindications: [1] Zhong Yao Cai. 2009年4月;32(4):520-1.[2] 廣州中醫大學，中醫學報，2009年11月，第26卷第6期;.[2] 廣州中醫大學，中醫學報，2009年11月第26卷第6期[3] 廣東醫學院學報，2008年2月，第26卷第1期[3] 《廣東藥學院學報》> 2008年2月26卷1期>
Chinese.Research: 這種草藥可以在不同程度上改善正常小鼠和免疫受損小鼠的免疫系統。這種草藥的多糖對小鼠T淋巴細胞的增殖有雙向調節作用。

English.Contraindications: [1] Zhong Yao Cai. 2009 Apr;32(4):520-1.[2] Guangzhou University of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Journal of Traditional Chinese medicine, November 2009, Vo.l26, No. 6;.[2] 廣州中醫大學，中醫學報，2009年11月第26卷第6期[3] Journal of Guandong Medical School, 2008, Feb, Vol. 26, No. 1[3] 《廣東藥學院學報》> 2008年2月26卷1期>
English.Research: This herb can improve to varying degrees of the immune system of normal mice and also those of immunocompromised mice. The polysaccharide of this herb showed a two-way adjustment on proliferation of mouse T lymphocytes.

Maladies Treated: 因瘀血和血块导致的月经停止
Chinese.Preparation: 1.5克至3克，粉末形式与液体同服。不可用于煎剂。
Chinese.Contraindications: 阴虚伴热者禁止使用。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明潜在用途，并强调对毒性的谨慎。
Chinese.Notes: 使用示例包括间质性膀胱炎的治疗。

Maladies Treated: Menses stoppage due to blood stasis and clots
English.Preparation: 1.5 g to 3 g, in powder form taken with liquid. Not used in decoction.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in case of yinxu (yin deficient) with heat.
English.Research: Modern research indicates potential uses and outlines the need for caution regarding toxicity.
English.Notes: Examples of use include treatment for interstitial cystitis.

Chinese.Preparation: 牙齿感染：用shi da gong lao的叶子9克。用水煮沸。每天一次。如果疼痛严重，则取2剂。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在脾虚（脾气不足）的情况下不使用。
Chinese.Research: 毒性与注意事项：在脾虚（脾气不足）的情况下不使用。

English.Preparation: For tooth infection: leaves of shi da gong lao 9 g. Boil with water. one dose a day. If pain is acute, take 2 doses.
English.Contraindications: not to use in case of pixu (spleen deficient).
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions: not to use in case of pixu (spleen deficient).

Maladies Treated: 癣（包括环状癣、运动员脚和阴囊癣）
Chinese.Preparation: 口服，煎剂3到10克，或制成丸剂、膏药和粉末。外用：用适量。研磨成粉并混合成膏状应用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 患有脾虚症状者应谨慎使用。
Chinese.Research: 含有多种植物油、维生素、单宁、糖类、少量生物碱和皂苷。
Chinese.Notes: 无

Maladies Treated: Tinea (including ringworm, athlete's foot and jock itch)
English.Preparation: Oral, in decoction 3 to 10 g, or mix into pills, plaster, and powder. For external application: use appropriate amount. Grind into powder and mix into paste and apply.
English.Contraindications: Those with pixu (spleen deficient) condition should use with care.
English.Research: Contains a variety of vegetable oils, vitamins, tannins, sugars, a little alkaloids and saponins.
English.Notes: None

Chinese.Preparation: 海底椰種子 (非洲海底椰) 切片用於製作湯。對於慢性咳嗽：海底椰 30 克，杏仁 9 克，新鮮生薑 2 片，乾或新鮮無花果 6 個，陳皮 6 克，瘦豬肉 1 公斤。煮 4 小時製作成湯。
Chinese.Contraindications: 今天在香港和廣東出售的幾乎所有海底椰並非非洲海底椰，而是來自泰國和其他東南亞國家的棕櫚樹果實 (Borassus flabellifer Linn)。從醫療的角度來看，這些不能作為替代品。棕櫚樹的果實比普通椰子小，且遠小於非洲海底椰。
Chinese.Research: 海底椰草藥的識別，見 http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/12569825。
Chinese.Notes: 未在傳統中國醫學文獻中找到有關非洲海底椰的信息。

English.Preparation: Slices of Semen Lodoiceae maldivicae (African hai di ye) is used in making soup. For Chronic cough: hai di ye 30 g, xing ren 9 g, fresh ginger 2 slices, dry or fresh figs 6 pieces, chen pi 6 g, lean pork 1 kilogram. Simmer for 4 hours to make into soup.
English.Contraindications: Almost all of the sea coconut sold in Hong Kong and Guangdong today is not the African sea coconut but the fruit of sugar palm (Borassus flabellifer Linn) from Thailand and other Southeast Asian countries. For medical purposes, they cannot be used as substitute. The fruit of sugar palm is smaller than a regular coconut and much smaller than the African sea coconut.
English.Research: Identification of sea coconut herb, see http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/12569825.
English.Notes: No information about African hai di ye has been found in classical Chinese medical texts.

Common: 求头石子草 (qiu tou shi zi cao)
天品一志香 (tian pin yi zhi xiang)
大毛儿燕 (da mao er yan)
黄花大戟 (huang hua da ji)
黄雅大戟 (huang ya da ji)

Maladies Treated: 淋巴结结核 (Tuberculosis of lymph nodes)
Chinese.Preparation: 内用：1.5到3克煎服。外用：适量，使用煎剂清洗患处。
Chinese.Contraindications: 怀孕期间不宜使用。不宜与元华、甘草同用。解毒药：石菖蒲。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明此草药具有各种毒性特征和相关注意事项。
Chinese.Notes: 这种草药以显著的利尿效果而闻名，内部和外部均可使用。
Chemical Ingredients: 2种有机酸：愈创木酸和另一种有机酸 (2 kinds of organic acid: syringic acid and another organic acid)

English.Preparation: Internal use: 1.5 to 3 g in decoction. 1 g per time in powder form. External use: use appropriate amount. Wash affected area with decoction.
English.Contraindications: Not to use during pregnancy. Not compatible with yuan hua, gan cao. Antidote: shi chang pu.
English.Research: Modern research indicates various toxic properties and cautions associated with the herb.
English.Notes: This herb is known for its significant diuretic effects and is used both internally and externally.
Chemical Ingredients: 2 kinds of organic acid: syringic acid and another organic acid

Botanical: Fagara ailanthoides (S. et Z.) Engl. var. ailanthoides
Fagara ailanthoides (Sieb. & Zucc.) Engl. var. pubescens Hatusima
Zanthoxylum ailanthoides sieb. & Zucc. var. inerme Rehd. & wils.

Chinese.Preparation: 煎煮使用：1.5克至3克；外用：捣碎后涂抹于患处或用煎剂洗涤。
Chinese.Contraindications: 阴虚火旺者忌服。
Chinese.Notes: 现代研究表明，该植物的树皮和根部含有的树脂具有止咳、消胀和强效刺激的特性。

Botanical: Fagara ailanthoides (S. et Z.) Engl. var. ailanthoides
Fagara ailanthoides (Sieb. & Zucc.) Engl. var. pubescens Hatusima
Zanthoxylum ailanthoides sieb. & Zucc. var. inerme Rehd. & wils.

English.Preparation: For use in decoction: 1.5 g to 3 g; for external application: smash and apply to affected area or wash with decoction.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of yin deficient with heat (陰虛火旺者忌服).
English.Notes: Modern research indicates the resin in the bark and roots has antitussive, carminative, and powerful stimulant properties.

Chinese.Preparation: 每日剂量：6 - 12 克。对于产后关节炎，可用方剂清热除痹汤（Rid of heat and arthritis decoction），该方剂由多种草药煮沸后作为茶饮用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 阴虚火旺者应谨慎使用。不建议心脏病患者和孕妇使用。感冒和月经期间应避免使用。
Chinese.Research: 海风藤可以增加心肌的营养血流并减少心肌缺血。它具有有效的抗炎特性，可能有助于治疗内源性毒素休克，因其对血小板激活因子（PAF）具有拮抗作用。
Chinese.Notes: 海风藤已被证明对心血管健康和炎症状况有多种有益影响。

English.Preparation: Daily dosage: 6 - 12 g. For postpartum arthritis, use in the formula Qing Re Chu Bi Tang (Rid of heat and arthritis decoction) which consists of multiple herbs boiled in water and used as tea.
English.Contraindications: Those with condition of yinxu with fire should use with care. Not advised for heart disease patients and pregnant women. Should be avoided during colds and menstrual periods.
English.Research: Hai feng teng can increase myocardial nutritional blood flow and reduce myocardial ischemia. It has effective anti-inflammatory properties and may help treat endotoxin shock due to its antagonistic effect on platelet activating factor (PAF).
English.Notes: Hai feng teng has been shown to have multiple beneficial effects on cardiovascular health and inflammatory conditions.

Botanical: 銀柴胡 L. var. lanceolata Bunge

Chinese.Contraindications: 對於感冒或流感患者以及有血虛情況的人不應使用此草藥。
Chinese.Research: 降膽固醇效果。

Botanical: Stellaria dichotoma L. var. lanceolata Bunge

English.Preparation: 3 to 10 g.
English.Contraindications: Those who are having cold or influenza and those with condition of blood deficiency should not use this herb.
English.Research: Lowering cholesterol effect.

Chinese.Preparation: 每日劑量：15~30克。對於腮腺炎：使用新鮮草藥，捣成泥狀外用。對於類風濕性關節炎：將連錢草搗碎，用酒炒至溫熱後外用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在壞疽、血虛及懷孕期間不宜服用。

English.Preparation: Daily dosage: 15~30 g. For mumps: use fresh herb, pound into paste and apply externally. For rheumatoid arthritis: smash lian qian cao, stir fry with wine until warm and apply externally.
English.Contraindications: Not to take in cases of gangrene, blood deficient and during pregnancy.

Maladies Treated: 因感染导致的泌尿道出血
Chinese.Preparation: 煎汤时用新鲜根部6 - 10克，10~30克。外用：使用适量。
Chinese.Contraindications: 孕期被认为是禁忌，因为它可能导致出血。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明具有抑制金黄色葡萄球菌和可能的抗癌作用，源于绿原酸。
Chinese.Notes: 如今，茎部主要被使用，因为可以每年多次收割，降低农民的成本。

Maladies Treated: Bleeding of the urinary tract due to infection
English.Preparation: For decoction 6 - 10 g of fresh root, 10~30 grams. External application: use appropriate amount.
English.Contraindications: Considered contraindicated in pregnancy, as it may induce bleeding.
English.Research: Modern studies indicate a property of inhibiting Staphylococcus aureus and potential anti-cancer effects due to chlorogenic acid.
English.Notes: Today, the stems are mainly used as they can be harvested multiple times a year, reducing costs for farmers.

Maladies Treated: 儿童寄生虫引起的腹泻
Chinese.Preparation: 将种子的外包裹浸泡在高浓度的米酒中约一个月。用于按摩淤伤和扭伤。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于因湿热感染或食物中毒引起的腹泻，妊娠期间，痔疮或牙龈感染。
Chinese.Notes: 腌制果实作为零食食用，可以减少毒性。

Maladies Treated: Diarrhea due to parasites in children
English.Preparation: Soak the outer wrapping of the seeds in rice wine of high alcohol content for about a month. For massaging bruises and sprains.
English.Contraindications: Not to be used in cases of diarrhea due to damp-heat infection or food poisoning, during pregnancy, hemorrhoids, or gum infections.
English.Notes: The pickled fruit is eaten as a snack, which reduces toxicity.

Chinese.Preparation: Oral: in decoction 3-15 g. External application: use appropriate amount. Make into powder and apply to affected area.
Chinese.Contraindications: No document available as of this writing. Beware of counterfeit herb.
Chinese.Research: In an experiment with ducks, the extract of yan huang lian has a significant protective effect on liver injury caused by hepatitis B virus.
Chinese.Notes: The supply is limited, mainly collected from the wild. Although cultivation has been successful, the yield is very low.

English.Preparation: Oral: in decoction 3-15 g. External application: use appropriate amount. Make into powder and apply to affected area.
English.Contraindications: No document available as of this writing. Beware of counterfeit herb.
English.Research: In an experiment with ducks, the extract of yan huang lian has a significant protective effect on liver injury caused by hepatitis B virus.
English.Notes: The supply is limited, mainly collected from the wild. Although cultivation has been successful, the yield is very low.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：煎湯15-30克；或使用新鮮藥材製作果汁。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在脾虛的情況下謹慎使用。
Chinese.Research: 這種水果的抗壞血酸（維生素C）因果實單寧酸的保護作用而非常穩定。
Chemical Ingredients: 單寧 (45%, 在未熟果實中30-35%)

English.Preparation: Taking orally: in decoction 15-30g; or use fresh herb to make juice.
English.Contraindications: Use with care in cases of spleen deficient.
English.Research: The ascorbic acid (vitamin C) of this fruit is very stable because of the protective effect of the tannin acid of the fruit.

Maladies Treated: 因伤口和脓肿引起的肿胀
Chinese.Preparation: 每日剂量：6到12克。对于肺部脓肿：合欢皮12克，桑白皮10克，桔梗5克，冬瓜子仁10克，桃仁10克，杏仁10克，鱼腥草10克，水800 cc。煮至300 cc。分3次饮用，可做成茶。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在胃炎情况下谨慎使用。发汗明显的风热（feng re）及感冒或流感、伴有入睡困难者禁用。
Chinese.Notes: 现代应用包括治疗失眠及由细菌感染导致的肝脓肿。

Maladies Treated: Swelling due to injuries and abscesses
English.Preparation: Daily dosage: 6 to 12 g. For abscess in the lungs: he huan pi 12 g, sang bai pi 10 g, jie gen 5 g, dong gua zi ren 10 g, tao ren 10 g, xing ren 10 g, yu xin cao 10 g, water 800 cc. Simmer to 300 cc. Make into 3 servings per day. Drink as tea.
English.Contraindications: Use with care in cases of gastritis. Do not use in case of feng re (wind heat type syndrome) with instant sweating and those with cold or influenza and with difficulty in sleep.
English.Notes: Modern application includes treatment for insomnia and liver abscesses caused by bacterial infection.

Chinese.Preparation: 通常剂量为9到15克。叶子可用于驱蚊。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适用于气虚型黄疸。
Chinese.Research: 茵陈蒿煎剂和挥发油对因四氯化碳毒素引起肝炎的兔子血清转氨酶（ALT, AST）没有影响。然而，它可以增加肝炎兔的食物摄入，并可能促进兔子肝细胞的再生。

English.Preparation: The dosage is typically 9 to 15 grams. Leaves can be used for mosquito repellent.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in qixu (qi deficiency) type of jaundice.
English.Research: Yin chen hao decoction and volatile oil have no effect on rabbit serum transaminases (ALT, AST) that was poisoned by carbon tetrachloride toxin that caused hepatitis. However, it can increase food intake in hepatitis rabbits and may promote regeneration of liver cells in rabbits.

Maladies Treated: 小儿消化不良和营养不良
Chinese.Preparation: 煎剂口服：12-20 克。外用：使用适量。捣碎或制成粉末状，涂抹于患处。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究信息未提供。
Chinese.Notes: 补脾肾虚，改善视力和听力：用此草药和猪肉做汤或与鸡蛋蒸。

Maladies Treated: chronic low grade fever with cough
weak digestion and malnutrition of small children
English.Preparation: In decoction for oral consumption: 12-20 g. External application: use appropriate amount. Smash or make into powder form and apply to affected area.
English.Research: Modern research information is not provided.
English.Notes: To correct spleen deficiency and kidney deficiency conditions, to improve eyesight and hearing: use this herb and pork to make soup or to steam with eggs.

Chinese.Preparation: 煮沸：5到15克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 阴虚脾虚伴有腹泻者禁用。
Chinese.Research: 含有增强心脏功能和促进血液循环的心脏苷，具有抗炎和镇痛特性，并对免疫系统有影响。

English.Preparation: In decoction: 5 to 15 g.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of yang deficient with spleen deficient and with diarrhea.
English.Research: Contains cardiac glycosides that enhance cardiac function and promote blood circulation, with anti-inflammatory and analgesic properties, and effects on the immune system.

Common: 中國遠志根 (zhōng guó yuǎn zhì gēn)

Chinese.Preparation: 5到10克煎服。
Chinese.Contraindications: 熱盛及熱毒和身體功能過度活躍的情況下不宜使用。在脾虛的情況下應謹慎使用。
Chinese.Research: 在小鼠研究中，15克/公斤體重的水煎劑內服具有祛痰效果。成分皂苷刺激胃的粘膜，促使支氣管分泌更多的粘液。近年使用的遠志部分為根皮。僅用根皮，最小有效劑量為1.25克/公斤。僅用根的中間木質部分，50克/公斤的劑量根本無效。根的木質部分含有非常少的皂苷。報告指出，將1克/公斤的遠志煎劑注入麻醉犬的胃中無祛痰效果。
Chinese.Notes: 傳統的本草綱目指出，使用的遠志部分為根皮，但現在使用整個根。

Maladies Treated: cough with difficulty in expelling phlegm
emotional disorientation with abundance of phlegm
English.Preparation: 5 to 10 g in decoction.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of heat is abundance, and where heat toxin and the body functions are over active. Use caution in cases of pixu (spleen deficient).
English.Research: In studies with mice, a water decoction of 15g/kilo of body weight, taken internally, had an expectorant effect. The ingredient saponin stimulates the mucus lining of the stomach, which triggers the bronchii to secrete more mucus. The part of yuan zhi that has been used is the skin of the root. Using the skin alone, the smallest effective amount is 1.25 grams/kilo. Using the middle wooden part of the root alone, the amount of 50 grams/kilo has no effect at all. The wooden part of the root contains very little saponin. Reports indicate that 1 gram/kilo of yuan zhi decoction infused into the stomachs of anesthetized dogs had no expectorant effect.
English.Notes: The traditional Materia Medica states the part of yuan zhi that is used is the skin of the root, but now the whole root is used.

Chinese.Contraindications: 中国北方的药草采集者使用甘六皮（香加皮）替代北方五加皮。长期使用五加皮酒可能导致包括失明、四肢麻木、头晕和头痛在内的毒性反应；长期使用可能致命。在阴虚和过热的患者中应谨慎使用。
Chinese.Research: 北方五加皮是一种心脏刺激剂，但对心脏有毒。
Chinese.Notes: 用北方五加皮制作的五加皮酒被广泛使用，但存在严重的健康风险。
Chemical Ingredients: 维生素 A 和 B

English.Preparation: 4.5~15 grams
English.Contraindications: Herb gatherers in northern China use gang liu pi (xiang jia pi) instead of northern wu jia pi. Long-term use of wu jia pi wine can lead to toxic reactions including blindness, numbness in limbs, dizziness, and headache; long-term use may cause death. Use caution in patients with yin deficiency and excessive heat.
English.Research: Northern wu jia pi is a heart stimulant but toxic for the heart.
English.Notes: Wu jia pi wine made from northern wu jia pi is widely used but poses serious health risks.
Chemical Ingredients: 異貝殼杉烯酸 kaurenoic acid (Ⅱ)

Maladies Treated: 单纯性疱疹 II 型
Chinese.Preparation: 使用全干草药 15~30 克煎煮并口服。外用：使用新鲜草药。捣碎，并涂抹在受影响区域。
Chinese.Contraindications: 注意香料果：可能对某些个体造成肝毒性，特别是肾功能不全者。消费香料产品后有急性肝炎的报告。
Chinese.Research: 参见文献。
Chinese.Notes: 现代研究表明有多种益处，并支持传统用途。

English.Preparation: Use the whole dry herb of 15~30 g for decoction and take orally. External application: use fresh herb. Smash and apply on affected area.
English.Contraindications: Caution on Noni fruit: may cause hepatotoxic effects for some individuals, particularly those with renal dysfunction. Reports of acute hepatitis after consumption of noni products.
English.Research: See bibliography.
English.Notes: Modern research indicates multiple beneficial effects and supports traditional uses.

Chinese.Preparation: 煮汤：3到9克。粉末形式：1.5到3克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 由于滑腻特性不适合煮汤，可能增加肠道活动。阴虚火旺者慎用。
Chinese.Research: 临床研究显示在治疗血管瘤、慢性哮喘支气管炎、胃肠疼痛和溃疡性慢性结肠炎方面的疗效，且有效率报告。
Chinese.Notes: 九香虫对各种细菌具有强抑制作用，促进新陈代谢。

English.Preparation: For decoction: 3 to 9 g. In powder form: 1.5 to 3 g.
English.Contraindications: Not suitable for decoction due to slippery characteristics which may increase bowel movements. Use with care in case of yinxu with fire.
English.Research: Clinical studies show efficacy for treating hemangioma, chronic asthmatic bronchitis, stomach and intestinal pain, and ulcerated chronic colitis with effective rates reported.
English.Notes: Jiu xiang chong possesses a strong inhibiting effect on various bacteria and promotes metabolism.

Botanical: 小胡荽变种（Hydrocotyle sibthorpioides Lam. Var. batrachium (Hance) Hand.-Mazz.ex Shan）

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：煎剂；9至10克，或捣碎后制成汁。外用：捣碎后外敷，或塞入鼻孔，或捣碎后制成耳滴。
Chinese.Contraindications: [1] 毒性与注意事项：中华本草
Chinese.Research: 抗病原微生物效果显示对金黄色葡萄球菌有强抑制作用。整株植物在抗疟筛选中表现出54%的抑制率。
Chemical Ingredients: 槲皮素-3-O-β（6-咖啡酰半乳糖苷）

Botanical: Hydrocotyle sibthorpioides Lam. Var. batrachium (Hance) Hand.-Mazz.ex Shan

English.Preparation: Oral: decoction; 9 to 10 g, or smash and make juice. External Application: smash and apply, or stuff into nostrils, or smash and make juice for ear drop.
English.Contraindications: [1] Toxicity & Cautions: Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草
English.Research: Anti pathogenic microorganism effect demonstrated strong inhibiting effect against Staphylococcus aureus. The whole plant showed inhibition rates of 54% in antimalarial screening.

Chinese.Preparation: 3到9克。与甘草一起使用以减少副作用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适合实证（强证）、阴虚和火旺体质。
Chinese.Research: 从东方草药中发现的抗痴呆药物：从吴茱萸提取的去氢吴茱萸碱·盐酸盐（DHED）可以防止学习和记忆的损害以及神经元丢失。给狗喂用该汤剂显示降低了血压，但与甘草结合使用时，效果消失。

Maladies Treated: Cold and dampness of swelling of legs
English.Preparation: 3 to 9 g. Use with gan cao to reduce side effects.
English.Contraindications: Not suitable for shi zheng (strong pattern), yinxu (yin deficient) and high fire body type.
English.Research: Antidementic Drug Discovery from Oriental Herb Medicine: Dehydroevodiamine.HCl (DHED) extracted from Evodia Rutaecarpa Bentham prevents Impairment of Learning and Memory and Neuronal loss. Feeding the decoction to dogs showed that it lowered the blood pressure but when combined with gan cao, the effect disappeared.

Chinese.Preparation: 对于阳痿或无法受孕：海马，烘干并制成粉末。每次服用3克，每天3次，与一些黄米酒一起服用。对于煎剂：3到9克。粉末形式服用：1到3克。外用：研磨成细粉。
Chinese.Contraindications: 怀孕期间或阴虚伴随高热的情况下不宜使用。大剂量和长期使用可能对肾脏有毒。
Chinese.Research: 海马的酒精提取物可以延长雌性大鼠的发情期，增加卵巢的重量，并具有雌性激素的作用。它可以增加前列腺、精子囊和提肛肌的重量。海马可以提高缺氧小鼠的阈值，降低单胺氧化酶，并降低体内的脂质过氧化物。海龙的水煎剂可以促进正常人周围淋巴细胞的转化并抑制人类癌细胞。

English.Preparation: For impotence or unable to conceive: hai ma, bake dry and make into powder. Take 3 g each time, 3 times a day with some yellow rice wine. For decoction: 3 to 9 g. Taken in powder form: 1 to 3 g. External use: grind into fine powder.
English.Contraindications: Not to use during pregnancy or in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with high heat. Large dosage and long term usage can be toxic to kidneys.
English.Research: The alcohol extract of hai ma can prolong the heat period of female rats, increases the weight of the ovaries and possesses the effect of female hormone. It can increase the weight of the prostate gland, spermatophore, and levator ani muscles. Hai ma can increase the threshold of mice in lack of oxygen, lower monoamine oxidase, and lower lipid peroxide inside the body. Water decoction of hai long can promote normal people peripheral lymphocyte transformation and inhibit human cancer cells.

Botanical: 东南香树 (Styrax tonkinensis (Pierre) Craib ex Hart.)

Chinese.Preparation: 0.6～1.5克，主要用于丸剂和粉剂形式。
Geography: 印度尼西亚, 苏门答腊
Chinese.Contraindications: 安息香的化学成分之一苯甲酸是有毒的。长期接触空气中苯甲酸浓度超过35–100部分百万可能导致从恶心和乏力到贫血和白血病等症状。
Chinese.Research: 部分资料来源：《中华本草》

English.Preparation: 0.6～1.5g, mostly being used in pill and powder form.
English.Contraindications: One of the chemical ingredients of an xi xiang benzoic acid (benzene) is toxic. Prolonged exposure to benzoic acid concentrations in excess of 35–100 parts per million in air may lead to symptoms ranging from nausea and excess fatigue to anemia and leukemia.
English.Research: 部份资料來源：《中華本草》

Chinese.Preparation: 1.5克到6克。外用時使用適量。
Chinese.Contraindications: 風寒造成的失聲時不要使用。過敏反應：頭暈、喉嚨感覺腫脹和阻塞、胸部沉重、癢和皮疹。

English.Preparation: 1.5 g to 6 g. Use appropriate amount for external application.
English.Contraindications: Not to use when loss of voice due to wind cold. Allergic reaction: dizziness, throat feels swollen and obstructed, heaviness in chest, itchiness and rash.

Chinese.Preparation: 常规剂量：1.5至9克。对于慢性咳嗽：1.5克~3克。作为补品：6至9克。用水煮：1.5至9克。以粉末形式使用：1至3克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不适合有溃疡、癫痫的患者使用，或那些过度运动、颅内压力过高、感冒或流感尚未清除、咳嗽早期伴有内热、以及早期麻疹患者。与磺胺类药物联合使用可能导致尿路出血。
Chinese.Research: 有助于防止肝损伤，促进肝脏药物代谢，降低ALT和AST，具抗氧化特性，促进新陈代谢，调节中枢神经系统，提高脑活动，降低胆固醇，提供抗高血压效果，以及帮助改善记忆力。
Chinese.Notes: 现代应用包括通过特定配方提高精子数量和精子活力。

English.Preparation: Usual dosage: 1.5 to 9 g. For chronic cough: 1.5 g ~ 3 g. For tonic: 6 to 9 g. Boiled with water: 1.5 to 9 g. Used in powder form: 1 to 3 g.
Geography: Provinces south of the Yangtze River
English.Contraindications: Not to be used by patients with ulcers, or epilepsy, or by those over-exercising, with high pressure in the cranium, cold or flu not yet clear, early stage of cough with internal heat, and those with early-stage measles. Combining with sulfonamides may cause bleeding in the urinary tract.
English.Research: Helps prevent liver damage, metabolizes drugs for liver, lowers ALT and AST, anti-oxidant properties, aids metabolism, regulates CNS, improves brain activity, lowers cholesterol, provides anti-hypertensive effects, and aids in memory improvement.
English.Notes: Modern applications include improving sperm count and sperm activity with specific formulations.

Chinese.Preparation: 煎剂：6到9克。外用：捣碎后涂抹，或制成粉末撒于患处。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在血液亏虚和/或气虚的情况下要小心使用，孕妇也要谨慎。过量使用可能导致疲乏、头晕、恶心、呕吐、心悸、呼吸急促和皮肤紫癜等毒性反应。严重情况可能导致肺水肿和呼吸衰竭。食用后也可能导致过敏反应，如皮肤瘙痒、皮疹和红斑。
Chinese.Research: 白蒺藜水提取物显示出抗炎作用和降压作用。具有利尿效果，广泛用于印度民间医学，并展现出抗菌特性。研究表明它可以抑制某些细菌的生长，并具有强抗真菌活性。
Chinese.Notes: 可能增加睾酮和促黄体生成素，有助于肌肉生长。用于民间医学治疗各种疾病。

Maladies Treated: Bulging sensation in the rib cage
English.Preparation: For decoction: 6 to 9 g. For external use: smash and apply or make into powder and sprinkle into affected parts.
English.Contraindications: Use care in cases of blood deficient and/or qi deficient and in cases of pregnancies. Overdose can cause toxic reactions such as lack of energy, dizziness, nausea, vomiting, palpitation, rapid respiration, and skin purpura. Serious cases can lead to lung edema and respiratory exhaustion. It may also cause allergic reactions such as skin itchiness, rash, and erythema after consumption.
English.Research: Tribulus terrestris water extract has shown anti-inflammatory effects and antihypertensive effects. It has diuretic effects, is used in Indian folk medicine, and exhibits antibacterial properties. Research indicates it can inhibit the growth of certain bacteria and has a strong antifungal activity.
English.Notes: May increase testosterone and luteinizing hormone, aiding in muscle growth. Used in folk medicine for various ailments.

Chinese.Contraindications: 忌用於脾虛、食欲不振、腹泻的情況。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明具有诸多药理作用，包括止咳和抗菌特性。

Maladies Treated: Thick phlegm with difficulty to expel
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of spleen deficiency, lack of appetite, loose stool.
English.Research: Modern research indicates various pharmacological effects including cough suppression and antibacterial properties.

Maladies Treated: 消化不良導致的食慾缺乏
Chinese.Preparation: 3到5克。對於有痰的咳嗽：使用陳佛手6-9克。用水煮沸後口服。對於脹氣和腹部膨脹：新鮮佛手120克，仁中白90克，製成粉末。空腹用開水沖服。
Chinese.Contraindications: 陰虛火旺且無氣滯者禁用。孕婦禁用。服用此藥時避免強烈陽光。
Chinese.Research: 該草藥具有抗哮喘效果，對腸道平滑肌有抗痙攣效應，對中樞神經系統有抑制效果，並具有心臟保護作用。
Chinese.Notes: 治療了65名患者。黃疸在平均4-5天內消除。精力和食慾有所改善。

Maladies Treated: Lack of appetite due to weak digestion
Chronic cough with abundance of phlegm
English.Preparation: 3 to 5 g. For cough with phlegm: use stale fo shou 6-9 g. Boil with water and take orally. For flatulence and swelling of abdomen: fresh fo shou 120 g, ren zhong bai 90 g, make into powder. Drink with boiled water on an empty stomach.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in those with yinxu with fire and without qizi. Do not use during pregnancy. Avoid strong sunlight while taking this herb.
English.Research: The herb has anti-asthma effects, anti-spasm effects on intestinal smooth muscle, inhibitory effects on the CNS, and has cardioprotective effects.
English.Notes: Treated 65 patients. Jaundice cleared in an average of 4-5 days. Energy and appetite improved.

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：1.5克到38克
Chinese.Contraindications: 可能导致头痛、失眠、焦虑、面色苍白、嘴唇紫色、肢体痉挛、高血压、呼吸急促、疲惫、死亡；可能导致水肿；其他副作用包括打嗝、皮肤瘙痒。
Chinese.Research: 调节中枢神经系统和循环系统；改善记忆和免疫功能；具有抗癌作用；降低血糖；防止糖尿病并发症；改善认知表现。
Chinese.Notes: 野生人参根比栽培的人参根贵；有粉末、胶囊和提取物等多种形式。掺假便宜产品的情况很常见。

Maladies Treated: Bleeding in the vagina not during period
English.Preparation: Dosage: 1.5 g to 38 g
English.Contraindications: May cause headaches, insomnia, anxiety, pale face, purple lips, spastic limbs, elevated blood pressure, rapid respiration, exhaustion, death; may cause edema; other side effects include hiccups, itchy skin.
English.Research: Regulates central nervous system and circulatory system; improves memory and immune function; possesses anti-cancer effects; lowers blood sugar; protects against diabetic complications; improves cognitive performance.
English.Notes: Wild ginseng roots are more expensive than cultivated ones; various forms like powder, capsules, and extracts exist. Adulteration with cheaper products is common.

Chinese.Preparation: 作为利尿剂：每天9~12克；促进月经：每天15~30克，煎汤。对于鼻出血、咳血、呕血、子宫出血、月经过多：千屈菜根7克，艾叶5克，车前草6克，生地黄10克，水500毫升，煮至200毫升，过滤后加入猪胶10克，溶解，分为3剂，每天服用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不用于因脾胃虚寒引起的情况（脾虚）。
Chinese.Research: 对治疗银屑病有效。

English.Preparation: As diuretics: 9~12 g per day; to promote menses: 15~30 g per day, as decoction. For nose bleeding, coughing blood, vomiting blood, bleeding in the uterus, over bleeding during menses: qian cao root 7 g, ai ye 5 g, che bo ye 6 g, sheng di huang 10 g, water 500 cc, simmer until 200 cc, strain and add e jiao 10 g, dissolve, make into 3 servings, per day.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of stomach or spleen cold from deficiency (spleen deficient).
English.Research: Effective for treating psoriasis.

Chinese.Preparation: 5-10克水煎服。
Chinese.Contraindications: 漢防己在大剂量或长期使用时可能对肾脏有毒。中毒症状包括头痛、头晕、恶心、呕吐、腹痛和呼吸困难。
Chinese.Research: 接受鹼草旋解素注射的实验动物显示出反射功能和痉挛增加，在某些情况下，导致麻痹和死亡。汉防己可以调节体温，木防己具有利尿作用，并缓解神经炎疼痛。
Chinese.Notes: 历史资料表明，不同地区的防己存在差异；在汉中产出的防己被称为汉中防己。方剂妇科分清丸已被标记为含有潜在有害成分。

English.Preparation: 5-10 grams boiled with water.
English.Contraindications: Han Fang Ji can be toxic to kidneys in large doses or with long-term usage. Symptoms of toxicity include headache, dizziness, nausea, vomiting, abdominal pain, and difficulty breathing.
English.Research: Lab animals receiving sinomenin injections showed increased reflex functions and spasms, and in some cases, paralysis and death. Han Fang Ji can regulate body temperature, and Mu Fang Ji has diuretic properties and relieves nerve inflammation pain.
English.Notes: Historical references indicate variations of Fang Ji from different regions; those produced in Han Zhong are referred to as Han Zhong Fang Ji. The formula Fu Ke Fen Qing Wan has been flagged for containing potentially harmful ingredients.

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：10至15克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在肾阴虚的情况下不要使用。与向日葵根、大黄、柴胡、茉莉、前胡不相容。如果下半身没有酵母感染、排尿后滴落或因肾虚而导致阴虚或背痛，慎用。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究指出抗生素效果、驱虫效果、降低胆固醇效果、抑制癌细胞效果。
Chinese.Notes: 根据《本草经集注》，与薏苡仁同用。根据《本草经疏》，如有提到的特定情况应避免使用。

Botanical: Dioscorea collettii Hook. f. var. hypoglauca

English.Preparation: Dosage: 10 to 15 g.
Geography: Northeastern part of Guangxi provinces of China
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of kidney yin deficiency. Incompatible with sunflower roots, da huang, chai hu, mo li, qian hu. Caution to avoid use if the lower part of the body does not have yeast infection, dripping after urination, or pain in the penis due to yin deficiency or back pain due to kidney deficiency.
English.Research: Modern research notes antibiotic effect, ridding of parasites effect, lowering cholesterol effect, inhibiting cancer cell effect.
English.Notes: According to Ben Cao Jing Ji Zhu, use with yi yi ren. According to Ben Cao Jing Shu, avoid if having specific conditions as mentioned.

Maladies Treated: 肝阳上亢伴眩晕和视物模糊
Chinese.Preparation: 煎剂中使用10到30克。先捣碎后再煮。一般使用生牡蠣，只有在中和酸时使用烘烤的牡蠣。
Chinese.Contraindications: 与麻黄、细辛、吴茱萸相克。身体虚弱、且有阳虚或肾虚没有实热的情况下不宜使用。有因寒冷引起的遗精者亦不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 在体内，酸性牡蠣壳（牡蠣）提取物可以抑制脊髓灰质炎病毒感染的小鼠，降低死亡率。
Chinese.Notes: 颈部结核通常是由于淋巴结感染引起的，称为淋巴腺炎。

Maladies Treated: Liver yang ascending with dizziness and blurry vision
English.Preparation: 10 to 30 g in decoction. Smash first before boiling. Use raw mu li except in neutralizing acid. To neutralizing acid use baked mu li.
English.Contraindications: Incompatible with ma huang, xi xin, wu zhu yu. Not to use when the body is weak and with condition of yangxu (yang deficient), or with condition of shenxu (kidney deficient) without heat. Those with spermatorrhea due to coldness also should not use.
English.Research: In vivo the acidic oyster shell (mu li) extract can inhibit polio virus infection murines reduces mortality.
English.Notes: Cervical tuberculosis is usually a result of an infection in the lymph nodes, known as lymphadenitis.

Chinese.Preparation: 用于感染时使用生薏苡仁。用于改善消化时使用炒薏苡仁。剂量：18克到38克，煎剂。一天一剂。7天为一个疗程。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在虚寒情况下不适合长期使用。怀孕期间需谨慎使用。脾虚伴有腹泻的情况，需要使用炒薏苡仁。
Chinese.Research: 薏苡醇是一种治疗艾尔里希腹水肉瘤的有效疗法。少量的薏米油可以刺激呼吸和心脏功能，而大量可以抑制它们。它促进子宫收缩，但孕妇不应使用。
Chinese.Notes: 有报告与其他谷物如高粱和大麦混淆；消费者应仔细核实包装。

English.Preparation: Use raw yi yi ren for infection. Use stir fried yi yi ren for improving digestion. Dosage: 18 g to 38 g, in decoction. One dose per day. 7 days is one therapy period.
English.Contraindications: Not for long term usage in cases of deficiency (weakness) and coldness. Use caution during pregnancy. In cases of spleen deficient with loose stool, use stir fried yi yi ren.
English.Research: Coixenolide is an effective therapy for Ehrlich ascites sarcoma. Small amounts of yi yi ren oil can stimulate breathing and heart function, while large amounts can suppress them. It promotes contraction of the uterus but should not be used by pregnant women.
English.Notes: There have been reports of confusion with other grains such as sorghum and barley; consumers should be careful to verify packaging.

Chinese.Preparation: 煎剂：4.5克到9克。如果用于煎剂，煮的时间不宜过长。应在煎煮的后期放入锅内。煮超过15分钟会削弱其降低肝阳上亢症状的降压效果。建议在处方中注明该药材应最后放入，并仅煮10分钟。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在动物中，大量使用会导致心脏和肝脏受损甚至死亡。对于虚弱或缺火的情况不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 毒性及注意事项：根据古典文献，它可能损伤气，且在虚弱情况下禁忌。
Chinese.Notes: 妊娠高血压综合征是妊娠引起的高血压症最严重的阶段，如不治疗可能导致严重的并发症或死亡。

English.Preparation: For decoction: 4.5 g to 9 g. If using in decoction do not boil for long time. It should be put into the pot during the later stage of decocting. Boiling over 15 minutes will weaken its effectiveness in lowering blood pressure in liver yang ascending syndrome. It is advisable to write down in prescription that the herb should be put in last and cook for only 10 minutes.
English.Contraindications: In animals, large amounts can cause damage to the heart and liver and even death. It should not be used in cases of deficiencies or lacking fire.
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions: It can damage qi and is contraindicated in cases of deficiencies according to classical writings.
English.Notes: Pre-eclampsia is the most severe stage of pregnancy-induced hypertension syndrome and can lead to serious complications or death if untreated.

Chinese.Preparation: 主要用于通过燃烧植物制造钾碱。
Chinese.Contraindications: 叶子含有大量草酸钙。
Chinese.Research: 毒性与注意事项：叶子含有大量草酸钙。
Chinese.Notes: 主要用于生产碳酸钾。

English.Preparation: Mainly used in making potash by burning the plant.
English.Contraindications: Leaves contain large amount of calcium oxalate.
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions: Leaves contain large amount of calcium oxalate.
English.Notes: Mainly used for producing potassium carbonate.

Chinese.Preparation: 6 到 9 克。
Chinese.Research: http://journal.shouxi.net/html/qikan/zxyjh/zxyjhxb/2007955/wz/20071007115536812_293474.html

English.Preparation: 6 to 9 g.
English.Research: http://journal.shouxi.net/html/qikan/zxyjh/zxyjhxb/2007955/wz/20071007115536812_293474.html

Chinese.Preparation: 作为蔬菜使用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 对于正在使用抗高血压药物的人，不要使用此草药，因为它具有降压效果。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明具有降压和抗生素效果，抑制金黄色葡萄球菌和志贺痢疾杆菌。

English.Preparation: Being used as a vegetable.
English.Contraindications: Do not use this herb for those using anti-hypertension drugs because it has hypotensive effect.
English.Research: Modern research indicates antihypertensive and antibiotic effects, inhibiting Staphylococcus aureus and Shigella diphtheria bacilli.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：制成煎剂或茶。花蕾：6-9克。全草：15-30克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 齐墩果苷也称为：橄榄苦苷; 橄榄苦素; 橄榄苦苷; 油橄榄叶提取物; 洋橄榄苦苷.
Chinese.Research: 从素馨花分离的橄榄苦苷对乙型肝炎病毒复制的抗病毒功效。毒性和注意事项提到潜在副作用。
Chinese.Notes: 用于改善循环，调节月经，减轻疼痛，清热解毒和肿瘤。

English.Preparation: Oral: make into decoction or tea. Buds: 6-9 g. Whole herb: 15-30 g.
English.Contraindications: 齊墩果甙也稱為：橄欖苦甙; 橄欖苦素; 橄欖苦苷; 油橄欖葉提取物; 洋橄欖苦甙.
English.Research: Antiviral efficacy against hepatitis B virus replication of oleuropein isolated from su xin hua. Toxicity and cautions mention potential side effects.
English.Notes: For improving circulation, regulating menses, reducing pain, ridding of heat and tumors.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：煎剂3至9克，或做成粉末形状与沸水混合。外用：适量，捣碎后敷于患处。
Chinese.Contraindications: 该草药主要用于四川、湖北和湖南地区。
Chinese.Research: 具有抗生素效果，可抑制革兰阳性细菌和其他各种细菌。抗炎特性影响镇静和止痛效果。显示出保护肝脏的效果，降低肝酶。通过抗氧化效果保护心血管。促进头发生长。
Chinese.Notes: “川东”这个名称指的是这种草药源于四川省的东部。

English.Preparation: Take orally: make decoction 3 to 9 g, or make into powder form and mix into boiling water. External application: appropriate amount, Smash and apply to affected area.
English.Contraindications: This herb is mainly used in Sichuan, Hubei, and Hunan areas.
English.Research: Antibiotic effects that can inhibit Gram-positive bacteria and various other bacteria. Anti-inflammatory properties influence sedative and analgesic effects. Liver protective effects shown in reducing liver enzymes. Cardiovascular protection through antioxidant effects. Promotes hair growth.
English.Notes: The name chuan dong refers to the eastern part of Sichuan province where it originated.

Chinese.Preparation: 何首乌在秋冬季节，叶子枯萎后采摘。煎煮通常剂量为9到30克。针对特定情况的制备方法包括用水煮或浸泡在米酒中。
Chinese.Contraindications: 脾虚患者应谨慎使用。在神阳虚伴有痰或腹泻的情况下不应使用。有部分患者报告肝炎症。
Chinese.Research: 何首乌粉已显示出降低高脂动物中胆固醇和甘油三酯水平的功效。它抑制脂肪肝的形成并保护肝功能。
Chinese.Notes: 小心在台湾销售的“本何首乌”，它可能是黄药子，具有毒性，不应频繁食用。

English.Preparation: He shou wu is harvested during fall and winter after the leaves become wilted. For decoction, typical dosages range from 9 to 30 grams. For specific conditions, preparation methods include boiling with water or soaking in rice wine.
English.Contraindications: Use caution in cases of spleen deficiency. Not to use in presence of phlegm or diarrhea due to shenyangxu. Reports of liver inflammation in some patients.
English.Research: He shou wu powder has shown efficacy in lowering levels of cholesterol and triglycerides in high lipid animals. It inhibits fatty liver formation and protects liver function.
English.Notes: Beware of 'Ben he shou wu' sold in Taiwan as it may be huang yao zi, which is toxic and should not be consumed frequently.

Botanical: Fritillaria unibracteata Hsiao et K. C. Hsiao

Chinese.Preparation: 煎剂：3到10克。粉剂（混合于水中）：1到2克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 脾虚、寒湿、痰湿咳嗽者禁用。也不与某些形式的川貝母同用。生贝母有毒，不可内服。
Chinese.Research: 小剂量的皂苷会导致狗、猫和兔子的血压升高，而大剂量会降低血压。注射7.5 ml/kg peimine 给兔子后，血糖上升并持续超过2小时。已注意到抗生素效果。
Chinese.Notes: 川貝母有良好的润燥作用，用于与肺健康相关的疾病。浙貝母比川貝母寒凉，泻下作用更强。

Botanical: Fritillaria unibracteata Hsiao et K. C. Hsiao

Maladies Treated: Hot cough due to Yin deficiency
English.Preparation: For decoction: 3 to 10 g. As powder form (mixed in water): 1 to 2 g.
English.Contraindications: Not to be used by those with spleen deficiency, cold, with wet phlegm and cold cough. Also not to be used with certain forms of chuan bei mu. Raw bei mu is toxic and not for internal use.
English.Research: Small amounts of the saponin can raise blood pressure in dogs, cats, and rabbits while large amounts can lower it. Injection of 7.5 ml/kg peimine to rabbits increased blood sugar maintained for more than 2 hours. Antibiotic effect has been noted.
English.Notes: Chuan bei mu is good for moisturizing and is used for conditions related to lung health. Zhe bei mu is colder and stronger in its purging effects compared to chuan bei mu.

Chinese.Contraindications: 在阴虚火旺的情况下，伴有头痛或因肝阳亢盛导致的月经过多不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 扩张冠状动脉，改善心肌血流，降低心肌氧消耗。改善大脑及四肢血流，降低外周血管阻力，抵抗辐射，抗生素效果，抗血小板凝聚。
Chinese.Notes: 有助于抵抗维生素E缺乏的影响，抑制酪氨酸酶活性，从而帮助消除老年斑和雀斑。
Chemical Ingredients: (Z)-4, 5-二羟基-6, 7-反式-二羟基-3-丁基亚油酸酯
(Z)-4, 5-二羟基-6, 7-顺式-二羟基-3-丁基亚油酸酯
3-丁基-3-羟基-4, 5, 6, 7-四氢-6, 7-二羟基亚油酸酯

English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) with high fire, headache or hypermenorrhea caused by liver yang overactive.
English.Research: Dilates coronary arteries, improves blood flow to heart muscles, lowers oxygen consumption of heart muscles. Improves blood flow to the brain and limbs, lowers resistance of the peripheral blood vessels, resists radiation, antibiotic effect, anti-coagulation of platelets.
English.Notes: Helps resist effect of lack of vitamin E and inhibits the activity of tyrosinase, thus helps to eliminate age spots and freckles.

Maladies Treated: 冲击性损伤引起的肿胀和疼痛
Chinese.Preparation: 煎剂口服：0.3至0.9克。粉末形式：0.15克至0.3克。
Geography: 在中国大部分地区栽培
Chinese.Contraindications: 这是一种非常有毒的草药。孕期禁用。大剂量和/或长期使用可能对肾脏有毒。过量也可能导致严重的心律失常、低血压和昏迷。
Chinese.Research: 其皂苷可能作为心脏兴奋剂的潜在良好药物。对流感病毒（RNA）和HSV（DNA）表现出相当的抗病毒活性（Rajbhandari等，2001年）。
Chinese.Notes: 如果您没有学习过此药材，请勿使用。

Chinese: hong hua jia zhu tao 紅花夾竹桃

Maladies Treated: Swelling and pain from impact injuries
English.Preparation: In decoction for oral consumption: 0.3 to 0.9 g. In powder form: 0.15 g to 0.3 g.
Geography: Cultivated in most parts of China
English.Contraindications: It is a very toxic herb. Not to use during pregnancy. Large dosages and/or long term usage can be toxic to kidneys. Overdose can also cause serious arrhythmia, hypotension, and coma.
English.Research: Its saponins may be a good potential for use as cardiac stimulant. Exhibited considerable antiviral activities against influenza virus (RNA) and HSV (DNA) (Rajbhandari et al. 2001).
English.Notes: Do not use if you are not trained in this herb.

Pharmaceutical: 枇杷叶提取物 (folium Eriobotryae japonicae)

Chinese.Contraindications: 不宜用于因外感风寒引起的咳嗽或因胃寒引起的呕吐。其成分乌索酸在一定程度上对精子有毒性。
Chinese.Research: 乌索酸显示出多种生物效应，包括镇静、抗炎、抗生素作用及改善肝功能等。它还被研究用于抗癌效果及抑制HIV的能力。
Chinese.Notes: 乌索酸是一种潜在的新型抗癌药物，具有低毒性和广泛的抗癌活性。由于其稳定性和对皮肤的益处，广泛应用于化妆品中。

English.Preparation: Dry leaves: 4.5 ~ 12 g; fresh leaves: 15 ~ 30 g.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cough due to externally contracted cold wind in the lung or vomiting due to stomach cold. Its ingredient, ursolic acid, is toxic to sperm to a certain extent.
English.Research: Ursolic acid has demonstrated various biological effects including sedation, anti-inflammatory, antibiotic properties, and improvements in liver function among others. It has been researched for its anti-cancer effects and ability to inhibit HIV.
English.Notes: Ursolic acid is a potential novel anticancer drug with low toxicity and broad anticancer activity. It is widely used in cosmetics due to its stability and skin benefits.

Botanical: Imperata cylindrica (L.) P. Beauv.var. major (Nees) c. E. Hubb.

Chinese.Preparation: 剂量：9到24克，单独使用，最多可达60克。用水煮沸以治疗癌症；作为茶饮用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 不应用于脾虚或肾阳虚的情况。如果血压低，由于其利尿作用需谨慎使用。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究：待上传

Botanical: Imperata cylindrica (L.) P. Beauv.var. major (Nees) c. E. Hubb.

English.Preparation: Dosage: 9 to 24 g, using by itself, up to 60 g. Boil with water for cancer remedy; use as tea.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of pixu (spleen deficient) or shenyangxu (kidney yang deficient) conditions. Use care if blood pressure is low because of its diuretic effect.
English.Research: Modern Research: to be uploaded

Chinese.Preparation: 15克（鲜根）。用于治疗眼睛黏膜炎：紫姜和姜黄各15克，孜然13粒，洗净切块。用1杯水煮沸，熬煮至剩半杯。煎剂冷却后过滤，口服。
Chinese.Contraindications: 避免将此草药与华法林、高血压药物或胆固醇药物混合使用。
Chinese.Research: 紫姜（Zingiber cassumunar Roxb.）及其活性成分的抗炎作用。紫姜根茎显示出超过30%的CYP3A4抑制增加。抑制环氧化酶-2（COX-2）。
Chinese.Notes: 在印尼民间医学中用于各种疾病，包括发热和消化问题。

Maladies Treated: Pain due to inflammation of the ears
English.Preparation: 15 g (fresh root). For treatment of inflammation of the mucous membrane of the eye: zi jiang and jiang huang 15 g each and cumin 13 pieces, washed and cut into pieces as needed. Boil with 1 cup water and render till half a cup is left. After the decoction has cooled down, filter and take orally.
English.Contraindications: Avoid mixing this herb with warfarin, hypertension drugs or cholesterol drugs.
English.Research: Anti-inflammatory effect of Zingiber cassumunar Roxb. and its active principles. Zingiber cassumunar rhizome showed more than 30% increase of CYP3A4 inhibition. Inhibits cyclooxygenase-2 (COX-2).
English.Notes: Used in Indonesian folk medicine for various ailments including fever and digestive issues.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：0.3～0.6克。也可作为香烟每天使用几次，但每天不超过1.5克。外用：用适量的煎剂清洗或制成糊状物涂抹。
Chinese.Contraindications: 整株植物是有毒的，特别是种子。其毒性是由阿托品类生物碱引起的。大剂量和/或长期使用可能对肾脏有毒。阿托品的解毒剂是物理斯替明或匹罗卡品。
Chinese.Research: 主要活性生化成分是主要的热带生物碱：阿托品、斯科opolamine、海索西明、阿托品、阿波阿托品、达图林、丁叉碱。中毒可引起各种严重症状。
Chinese.Notes: 由于其高毒性，建议谨慎使用。可以抑制汗腺分泌。

English.Preparation: To take orally: 0.3～0.6g. Also being used as cigarettes for several times per day but not over 1.5 g per day. For external application: wash with decoction using appropriate amount or make into paste and apply.
English.Contraindications: The whole plant is toxic, especially the seeds. Its toxicity is caused by the atropin type of alkaloids. Large dosages and/or long term usage can be toxic to kidneys. Antidote to atropine is physostigmine or pilocarpine.
English.Research: The principal active biochemicals are the primary tropane alkaloids: atropine, scopolamine, hyoscyamine, atropine, apoatropine, daturine, tigloidine. Poisoning can cause various severe symptoms.
English.Notes: Caution is advised due to its high toxicity. Can suppress sweat gland secretion.

Common: 黑牵牛子 黑牵牛子
白牵牛子 白牵牛子
喇叭花 (trumpet flower) 喇叭花
Botanical: 菲尔比提斯尼尔 (Pharbitis nil (L.) Choisy)
菲尔比提斯紫花 (Pharbitis purpurea (L.) Voigt)

Chinese.Preparation: 4.5 至 9 克煎煮; 0.3 ~ 1.5 克粉末形式。
Chinese.Contraindications: 这是一种强烈的草药。少量可以帮助排便；大量会导致严重腹泻。建议短期使用于痰多的咳嗽和哮喘，但不宜长期或大量使用。避免在脾虚、气虚和怀孕期间使用。生种子有毒，气味强烈刺鼻。炒制可以减少毒性并缓和通便效果。
Chinese.Notes: 炒制后，草药松散且易碎，更容易粉碎和煎煮以提取有效成分。

Common: hei qian niu zi 黑牽牛子
bai qian niu zi 白牽牛子
la ba hua (trumpet flower) 喇叭花

English.Preparation: 4.5 to 9 g in decoction; 0.3 ~ 1.5 g in powder form.
English.Contraindications: This is a strong herb. Small amounts can help bowel movements; large amounts can cause heavy diarrhea. Temporary use for cough with abundance of phlegm and asthma is advised, but not for long-term or large amount use. Avoid in cases of spleen deficiency, qi deficiency, and during pregnancies. The raw seed is toxic, with a strong pungent smell. Stir-frying reduces toxicity and moderates laxative effects.
English.Notes: After stir frying, the herb is loose and brittle, making it easier to smash and decoct to extract effective ingredients.

Chinese.Preparation: 4到12克
Chinese.Contraindications: 在身体虚弱或妊娠的情况下不使用。
Chinese.Research: 毒性与注意事项。
Chinese.Notes: 用于白血病：参术丸。

English.Preparation: 4 to 12 g
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of weak body or pregnancies.
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions.
English.Notes: Being used in leukemia: shen zhu wan.

Chinese.Preparation: 9到15克，煎水服用 (9 to 15 g, prepared as a water decoction.)
Chinese.Contraindications: 不宜用于血虚和阴虚有火者 (Not to use in blood deficient and yinxu with fire.)
Chinese.Research: 20%的水煎剂可以降低血乳酸并增强肝脏保护 (20% water decoction can lower blood lactate and enhance liver protection.)
Chinese.Notes: 有效改善精子质量和治疗阳痿 (Effective in improving sperm quality and treating impotence.)

English.Preparation: 9 to 15 g, prepared as a water decoction.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in blood deficient and yinxu with fire.
English.Research: 20% water decoction can lower blood lactate and enhance liver protection.
English.Notes: Effective in improving sperm quality and treating impotence.

Maladies Treated: 因寄生虫导致的儿童营养不良
Chinese.Preparation: 煎服：5–9克。粉末服用：1到1.5克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 此草药与桔梗、茯苓、白薯、桑螵蛸相克。
Chinese.Research: 在实验动物研究中，僵蠶表现出强烈的催眠作用，并对由溴化物引起的抽搐有显著的抑制作用。
Chinese.Notes: 将僵蠶与党参、白术、天麻、全蝎结合使用，有助于治疗与气虚、脾虚及镇静癫痫相关的症状。

English.Preparation: For decoction: 5–9 g. For taking in powder form: 1 to 1.5 g.
English.Contraindications: This herb antagonizes jie geng, fu ling, bei xie, sang piao xiao.
English.Research: In lab animal studies, jiang can showed a strong hypnotic effect and also showed an inhibitory effect against convulsions caused by strychnine.
English.Notes: It is appropriate to combine jiang can with dang shen, bai zhu, tian ma, quan xie for treating conditions related to qi deficiency, spleen deficiency, and calming epilepsy.

Chinese.Preparation: 煎煮：15至30克。外用：適量使用。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在慢性腹瀉和體弱的老年人中不應使用。傳統的口服使用，當適當利用時，可以避免任何毒性風險。
Chinese.Research: 從鳳尾草的地上部分中分離出一種新的C(14)羽狀萜類，名為(2R)-羽狀素P，以及一種新的天然產物，名為去氫羽狀素B，以及九種已知化合物。這些化合物對人類胰腺癌和人類小細胞肺癌細胞系顯示出顯著的細胞毒性。

English.Preparation: For decoction: 15 to 30 g. For external application: use appropriate amount.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in cases of chronic diarrhea and in old people with weak body. Traditional oral administration, when properly utilized, can avoid any toxic risk.
English.Research: A new C(14) pterosin sesquiterpenoid, named (2R)-pterosin P, and a new natural product, named dehydropterosin B, were isolated from the aerial parts of Pteris multifida Poir., along with nine known compounds. Compounds showed potent cytotoxicity against human pancreatic cancer and human small-cell lung cancer cell lines.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：煮1到3片，或生吃。外用：适量涂搽于患处。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在冠心病、高血压和动脉粥样硬化的情况下需谨慎使用。
Chinese.Research: 蛋黄中的卵磷脂、甘油三酯和胆固醇在神经系统的生理发展中起重要作用。胆碱可能改善所有年龄段的记忆力。

English.Preparation: For oral consumption: cook 1 to 3 pieces, or taken raw. External application: use appropriate amount and apply on affected area.
English.Contraindications: Use with care in cases of coronary heart disease, hypertension, arterial atherosclerosis.
English.Research: The lecithin, triglycerides, and cholesterol of egg yolk play a significant role in physical development of the nervous system. Choline may improve memory in all age groups.

Chinese.Preparation: 6-9克用于煎剂或制成丸剂或粉剂。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在血虚或气虚的情况下不宜单独使用。小心用于阴虚和/或血热症状的案例。月经提前的人可能是血热，不要使用这种草药。
Chinese.Research: 研究表明它具有抗生素、抗炎、退热特性，降低血压，具有麻醉效果，抑制子宫收缩，并具备雌激素样活性。
Chinese.Notes: 山东生产的被称为东香附，而浙江的被称为南香附，后者被认为质量更好。

English.Preparation: 6-9 g for decoction or make into pills or powder.
English.Contraindications: Not to use by itself in cases of xue xu (blood deficient) or qixu (qi deficient). Use care in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) and/or xue re (heat in blood) condition. Those with menses that come early can be heat in blood. do not use this herb.
English.Research: Studies indicate it has antibiotic, anti-inflammatory, anti-pyretic properties, lowers blood pressure, has anesthetic effects, inhibits contraction of the uterus, and possesses estrogen-like activity.
English.Notes: Those produced in Shandong are called dong xiang fu while those from Zhejiang are known as nan xiang fu, which is considered to be of better quality.

Chinese.Preparation: 每日剂量: 干草药: 3 克
Chinese.Contraindications: 过敏反应包括：皮疹、哮喘加重、过敏性休克和 gastrointestinal 副作用。
Chinese.Research: 紫锥花提取物具有抗病毒作用。紫锥花苷具有明显的抗氧化、神经保护、肝脏保护、抗炎、抗肿瘤、改善学习和记忆以及刺激免疫系统的效果。

English.Preparation: Daily Dosage: dry herb: 3 g
English.Contraindications: Allergic reactions include: rashes, increased asthma, anaphylaxis, and gastrointestinal side effects.
English.Research: Echinacea extract possesses anti-viral effect. Echinacoside possesses the obvious effect of anti-oxidation, nerve protection, liver protection, anti-inflammation, anti-tumor, improving learning and memory and stimulation of the immune system.

Chinese.Preparation: 内服3到10克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 注意使用错误的替代品，青木香（马兜铃的根）对肾脏有毒。阴虚情况下不要使用木香。过敏反应可能包括轻微腹痛、瘙痒、胸部紧绷感和腹泻。
Chinese.Research: 观察到对HBV抗原的抗病毒活性。目前正在进行进一步研究。
Chinese.Notes: 注意使用替代品及与特定品种相关的潜在毒性。

English.Preparation: 3 to 10 g for internal use.
English.Contraindications: Beware of using the wrong substitute, qing mu xiang (root of ma dou ling) is toxic for the kidneys. Do not use mu xiang in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) condition. Allergic reactions may include mild abdominal pain, itchiness, tightness in chest area, and diarrhea.
English.Research: Antiviral activity observed against HBV antigen. Further research is ongoing.
English.Notes: Beware of using substitutes and the potential toxicity associated with specific varieties.

Chinese.Contraindications: 在湿寒、肾阳虚引起的遗精或 leucorrhagia 的情况下不宜使用。长期使用可能导致肠道刺激。
Chinese.Research: 水提取物的浸出液在实验室小鼠中未显示出死亡率，但大剂量导致肝细胞和肾细胞的混浊和突变。
Chinese.Notes: 泽泻具有利尿效果，可能不适合阴虚的情况。
Chemical Ingredients: 阿利索 A 单乙酸酯
阿利索 B 单乙酸酯
阿利索 C 单乙酸酯
16β-美氧基阿利索 B 单乙酸酯
16β-羟基阿利索 B 单乙酸酯

English.Contraindications: Do not use in case of damp cold, spermatorrhea or leukorrhagia due to kidney yang deficiency. May cause intestinal irritation with prolonged usage.
English.Research: Infusion of water extract did not show mortality in laboratory mice, but large dosages caused murkiness and mutation in liver and kidney cells.
English.Notes: Ze xie possesses diuretic effect, which might not be suitable for yin deficient conditions.

Chinese.Preparation: 成人：每次5到12粒种子，每天3次。小孩：1到2颗种子每岁（不超过12颗）。通常和龙眼肉一起包裹或者装入胶囊服用。外用：适量。
Chinese.Contraindications: 脾虚、恶心、呕吐、胃肠出血、肝或肾病患者禁用。妊娠和儿童使用时需谨慎。
Chinese.Research: 毒性和注意事项：有毒性，特别提示在某些健康状况下禁用。
Chinese.Notes: 治疗瘧疾：使用10颗鴉膽子，每颗用龙眼肉包裹。吞下。3天后减半剂量（5颗）。继续服用5天。

English.Preparation: Adult: 5 to 12 seeds each time, 3 times per day. Small children 1 to 2 seeds per year old (not to exceed 12 seeds). Usually taken with long gan rou as wrapping or in capsules. External use: appropriate amount.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of spleen deficiency, nausea, vomiting, gastrointestinal bleeding, liver or kidney diseases. Use with caution during pregnancy and in children.
English.Research: Toxicity & Cautions: Toxicity is noted, with specific advises against usage in certain health conditions.
English.Notes: For treatment of malaria: use 10 pieces of ya dan zi and wrap each in long yan meat. Swallow. After 3 days, lessen the dosage to half (5 pieces). Continue taking for 5 days.

Chinese.Contraindications: 湿热或阴虚火旺者禁用。对排尿困难的患者要谨慎使用，但通常肾阳虚患者容易出现前列腺增生。有些古籍提到不要与丹参（Radix salivae miltiorrhizae）共同使用。
Chinese.Research: 巴戟天提取物可以用来抵消氢化可的松对胸腺和肾上腺皮质萎缩的负面影响，以及SGPT (ALT) 水平的升高。
Chemical Ingredients: 阿斯贝罗斯苷四乙酸酯

Maladies Treated: Weak and achy loin and knees
English.Preparation: 4 ~ 10 grams.
English.Contraindications: Contra-indication for damp heat or heat caused by yin deficiency. Use caution in patients with difficulty in urination but usually shenyangxu patients have tendency to develop enlargement of prostate. Some old literatures mentioned not to use it with dan shen (Radix salivae miltiorrhizae).
English.Research: Ba ji tian extract can be used to counter-act the adverse effect of hydrocortisone on the atrophy of thymus gland, and adrenal cortex, and the increase level of SGPT (ALT).

Chinese.Preparation: 每日10至20克；浓缩提取物：每日0.5至2克。阴道酵母菌感染：虎杖100克，水1500毫升。煮至1000毫升。过滤。冷却至浴水温度。坐浴10至15分钟，每日一次，持续7天。
Chinese.Contraindications: 孕期禁用。大剂量和/或长期使用可能对肾脏有毒。
Chinese.Research: 研究评估了虎杖苷的药理作用，包括预防因动脉内皮损伤引起的血栓形成、改善微循环以及缓解缺血-再灌注造成的组织损伤。
Chinese.Notes: 虎杖苷可能成为治疗血栓性疾病和改善休克中微循环的新特征药物。

English.Preparation: 10 to 20 g per day; concentrated extract: 0.5 to 2 g per day. For vaginal yeast infection: hu zhang 100g, water 1500 cc. Simmer down to 1000 cc. Strain. Cool down to bath water temperature. Use for sitting bath for 10 to 15 minutes, once a day for 7 days.
English.Contraindications: Not to use during pregnancy. Large dosages and/or long term usage can be toxic to kidneys.
English.Research: Studies have evaluated the pharmacologic actions of polydatin, including prevention of thrombosis from arterial endothelial damage, improvement of microcirculation, and alleviation of tissue damage from ischemia-reperfusion.
English.Notes: Polydatin may become a new characteristic drug for treating thrombotic diseases and improving microcirculation in shock.

Chinese.Preparation: 3到9克；对于皮肤病，将40克磨成细粉，过滤后用纱布袋敷用。对于产后头晕，炒31克至棕色，每次使用6克加38克孩子的尿液。
Chinese.Contraindications: 有过敏反应的报告。避免在出汗的虚弱、无风无湿的血虚情况下使用，阴虚引起的面红和头痛者谨慎使用。
Chinese.Research: 全草含有挥发油，有助于其抗菌和抗炎特性。
Chinese.Notes: 黑荊芥是指炒至炭化的荊芥。

English.Preparation: 3 to 9 grams; for skin diseases, grind 40 g into fine powder, strain, and apply in cheese cloth bags. For dizziness after childbirth, stir fry 31 g until brown, use 6 g each time with 38 g of child urine.
English.Contraindications: There are reports of allergic reactions. Avoid use in cases of deficiency with sweating, blood deficiency without wind and damp, and caution in those with yin deficiency causing red face and headache.
English.Research: The whole plant contains evaporating oil, contributing to its antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties.
English.Notes: hei jing jie is that which has been stir-fried until it becomes charcoal.

Botanical: 大馬士革黑種草(Nigella damascena L.)

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：煎剂，9-15克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 孕期不得使用。
Chinese.Research: 黑種草(Nigella sativa L.)的水提取物对难治性癫痫的儿童具有抗癫痫效果。研究表明其具有抗菌、抗炎、抗肿瘤、抗氧化、抗血小板凝聚、降低血脂和血糖水平及雌激素效应等多种作用。
Chinese.Notes: 如有湿热，不可使用糖。

English.Preparation: Oral: in decoction, 9-15 g.
English.Contraindications: Do not use during pregnancy.
English.Research: The water extract of Nigella sativa L. has antiepileptic effects in children with refractory seizures. Research indicates various effects including antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, anti-tumor, antioxidant, anti-platelet coagulation, lowering blood lipid and sugar levels, and estrogenic effects.
English.Notes: If there is damp heat, do not use sugar.

Chinese.Preparation: 3至9克。对于抽搐/痉挛肌肉：15至30克。可以用水煮沸后泡茶（在最后一分钟添加薄荷）。
Chinese.Contraindications: 怀孕期间需谨慎使用。 不适用于虚症和没有风热型综合症的患者。
Chinese.Notes: 蟬蜕常带有泥土，因此建议单独包装并在使用前清洗干净。

English.Preparation: 3 to 9 g. For convulsion/spastic muscles: 15 to 30 g. Can be used in tea by boiling with water (add bo he during the last minute).
English.Contraindications: During pregnancy, use with care. Do not use in deficient syndrome and in those without wind heat type syndrome.
English.Notes: Chan tui is often found with dirt, so it is recommended to package it separately and wash it clean before use.

Chinese.Preparation: 每日9~30克煎汤
Chinese.Contraindications: 在消化系统感染的情况下不宜使用。与李露（Veratrum nigrum L.）相克。报告的副作用包括头晕、胸部不适、紧张不安、口干等。
Chinese.Research: 改善身体功能，具有抗疲劳特性，刺激神经系统，提高免疫系统，增加红细胞、白细胞和血红素，增强血液凝固，提高血糖。
Chinese.Notes: 配方样本包括四君子汤和十全大补汤。

English.Preparation: 9~30 g per day in decoction
English.Contraindications: Not to use in cases of infection of the digestive system. Incompatible with li lu (Veratrum nigrum L.). Side effects have been reported, like dizziness, discomfort in the chest area, nervous and uneasy, dry mouth, etc.
English.Research: Improves body function, has anti-fatigue properties, stimulates the nervous system, improves immune system, increases red blood cells, white blood cells and heme, enhances blood coagulation, raises blood sugar.
English.Notes: Samples of formulae include shi quan da bu tang and si jun zi tang.

Maladies Treated: 发烧儿童的寄生虫感染
Chinese.Contraindications: 有报告称在每日三次服用100毫克苦苣碱的4至13天期间出现恶心、呕吐。一名患者在服用100毫克苦苣碱后出现心悸和心率缓慢，但在停药后恢复。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明可能有毒性，使用时需谨慎，尤其是关于苦苣碱的影响。
Chinese.Notes: 配方样本包括用于各种治疗的组合。

Maladies Treated: parasite infection in children with fever
English.Contraindications: There are reports of nausea, vomiting during the period of taking 100 mg of gentianine 3 times daily, 4 ~ 13 days. One patient had palpitation and slow heart rate after taking 100 mg of gentianine but recovered after discontinuing it.
English.Research: Modern studies indicate potential toxicity and caution in usage, particularly regarding the effects of gentianine.
English.Notes: Samples of formulae include combinations for various treatments.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：主要使用制备好的草药，3到10克煎汤。外用：适量。
Geography: 中国大部分省份，西北地区和西藏除外
Chinese.Contraindications: 全株有毒。草药必须在使用前制备。冷性咳嗽或脾虚状态下不宜使用胆南星。
Chinese.Research: 胆南星是通过使用猪胆汁制备的，效果更佳且更安全。
Chinese.Notes: 附录：胆南星（与胆汁混合的南星）是将制备好的南星与牛、羊、山羊或猪的胆汁混合，或通过发酵将生南星与这些胆汁混合而成。

Maladies Treated: Cough with heat and yellow phlegm
English.Preparation: Taking orally: mainly using the prepared herb, 3 to 10 g in decoction. External use: appropriate amount.
Geography: Most provinces of China, except northwest area and Xizang (Tibet)
English.Contraindications: The whole plant is toxic. The herb must be prepared before use. Do not use dan nan xing in cold type of cough or in condition of pixu (spleen deficient).
English.Research: Dan nan xing is prepared by using pig's bile. It is more effective and safer.
English.Notes: Addendum: Dan nan xing (arisaema cum bile) is made by mixing prepared nan xing with bile of cow, sheep, goat, or pig, or mixing sheng nan xing with those bile through fermentation.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：1.3 - 9 克用于煎剂。外用：60 - 90 克。制成煎剂后，趁液体温热蒸汽熏洗患处。
Chinese.Contraindications: 现代研究资料中有关于毒性和注意事项的说明。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明使用时可能存在毒性和注意事项。

English.Preparation: Take orally: 1.3 - 9 g for decoction. For external use: 60 - 90 g. Make into decoction and steam and wash affected area while liquid is warm.
English.Contraindications: Toxicity & Cautions are noted in modern research sources.
English.Research: Modern research indicates potential toxicity and cautions regarding use.

Botanical: 大根桔梗 (Platycodon grandiflorum) A. DC.

Chinese.Preparation: 典型剂量为3至10克。常用于如桔梗汤和桔梗白散的方剂，采用煎煮法制备。
Chinese.Contraindications: 阴虚、慢性咳嗽、呼吸困难及吐血者禁用。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究结果待加载。

English.Preparation: The typical dosage is 3 to 10 grams. Commonly used in formulas like jie geng tang and jie geng bai san, prepared by decoction.
English.Contraindications: Not to use in case of yinxu (yin deficient) with chronic cough, breathing difficulty, and vomiting blood.
English.Research: Modern research findings are to be loaded.

Maladies Treated: 由感染引起的急性腹泻
由真菌感染引起的肠道炎症
肠道的阴道毛滴虫感染
inflammation of the intestine due to fungal infection

Chinese.Preparation: 内服：煎服，10 ~ 15克。外用：适量。
Chinese.Contraindications: 毒性和注意事项包括参考文献中提到的潜在不良反应。
Chinese.Research: 已研究多种与抗炎和抗生素效应相关的化学成分。

English.Preparation: For taking orally, make into decoction: 10 ~ 15 g. External use: appropriate amount.
English.Contraindications: Toxicity and cautions include potential adverse effects as mentioned in the references.
English.Research: Various chemical components related to anti-inflammatory and antibiotic effects have been studied.

Pharmaceutical: 香薷科药草（Herba Elsholtziae seu Moslae）
Botanical: 光叶香薷（Elsholtzia splendens Nakai ex Mackwa）

Chinese.Preparation: 将香薷和厚朴切成小块。炒香白扁豆至微焦，捣碎。将所有药材放入温热的保温瓶中，倒入开水。盖上，保持温暖一个小时。或者，也可以在炉子上煮沸，慢炖45分钟。
Chinese.Contraindications: 如有外感汗出或阴虚内热者不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明，该 herb 具有与挥发油相关的利尿作用，这些挥发油促进肾脏血管扩张并增加滤过压力。

English.Preparation: Cut xiang ru and hou po into small pieces. Stir fry bai bian dou until brown, smash. Put all herb into a warm thermos and pour in boiling water. Cover and keep warm for an hour. Alternatively, it can be boiled on stove with water and simmered for 45 minutes.
English.Contraindications: Do not use in case of external deficiency with instant sweating or yin deficiency with heat.
English.Research: Modern research indicates that the herb has diuretic effects related to its volatile oils that facilitate renal vasodilation and increase filtration pressure.

Chinese.Preparation: 内服：煎剂0.9-1.5克；可以制成丸或粉。外用：适量。
Chinese.Contraindications: 有水肿或呕吐的情况下不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 现代研究表明潜在的用途和注意事项。

English.Preparation: Internal use: 0.9-1.5g in decoction; can be made into pills or powder. External use: appropriate amount.
English.Contraindications: Not to be used in case of edema or vomiting.
English.Research: Modern research indicates potential uses and cautions.

Maladies Treated: 风寒湿型关节和肌肉疼痛
Chinese.Preparation: 用于去除风寒：3-9克。超过20克的大剂量用于肌肉痉挛。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在血虚或阴虚伴热和头痛的情况下需小心使用。
Chinese.Research: 药学学报。2007年5月；42(5)：505-10。ACTA PHARMACEUTICA SINICA，2007年，五月；42(5)：505-10。
Chinese.Notes: 这种草药可以缓解疼痛而不会造成干燥。在风药中被认为是一种滋润的草药。

Maladies Treated: Wind cold and damp type of joint and muscle pain
English.Preparation: For ridding of wind chill: 3-9 g. Larger amounts of more than 20 g are used for muscle spasm.
English.Contraindications: Use care in cases of blood deficient or yinxu (yin deficient) with heat and headache.
English.Research: Yao Xue Xue Bao. 2007 May;42(5):505-10. 藥學學報 ACTA PHARMACEUTICA SINICA，2007年，五月；42(5):505-10.
English.Notes: This herb can relieve pain and does not create dryness. It is considered a moistening herb among wind herbs.

Chinese.Preparation: 治疗类风湿关节炎：鉤藤 30克，防风 6克，杜胡 3克。研磨成粗粉。用纸卷起。点燃并熏蒸受影响的区域。每日剂量为0.1克到0.15克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 全株有毒。通常仅用于外用。幼叶特别有毒。没有有效的解毒剂。常用的治疗方法是洗胃、促使呕吐和腹泻。
Chinese.Research: 在山地部落中，Gelsemium elegans Benth. 被认为是一种有效的自杀手段。其叶子中分离出的生物碱在动物中显示出镇痛和抗炎效果。在致死剂量下，生物碱可导致呼吸衰竭。
Chinese.Notes: 主要用于外用。若使用不当，可能刺激皮肤并形成水泡。

English.Preparation: For treatment of rheumatoid arthritis: gou teng 30 g, fang feng 6 g, du huo 3 g. Grind into coarse powder. Roll with paper. Light with fire and smoke the affected areas. The daily dosage is 0.1 g to 0.15 g.
English.Contraindications: Whole plant is toxic. It is usually for external use only. The young leaves are especially toxic. There is no effective antidote. The commonly used therapy is gastric lavage, promoting vomiting and diarrhea.
English.Research: Gelsemium elegans Benth. is known among hill tribes as an effective means for committing suicide. Alkaloids isolated from its leaves have shown analgesic and anti-inflammatory effects in animals. At lethal doses, alkaloids can cause respiratory failure.
English.Notes: Mainly for external use. Can irritate skin and form blisters if not used correctly.

Botanical: Dendrobium fimbriatum Hook var. oculatum Hook

Maladies Treated: 发热病后虚弱 (Weakness after febrile diseases)
慢性喉咙感染 (Chronic throat infection)
糖尿病阴虚证 (Diabetes with yinxu condition)
Chinese.Preparation: 干草药：7至15克 (Dry herb: 7 to 15 g)。新鲜草药：15至38克 (Fresh herb: 15 to 38 g)。
Chinese.Contraindications: 大剂量可能对心脏和肺功能产生抑制作用；过量可能导致抽搐 (Large dosages may cause inhibiting effects on heart and lung functions; overdosages may cause convulsions).
Chinese.Research: 石斛的鉴定已在科学研究中记录 (Identification of dendrobium has been documented in scientific research).
Chinese.Notes: 在中国大陆生产的石斛叶光丸可能不符合台湾卫生部门的检验标准 (Shi hu ye guang wan produced in mainland China may not meet health department inspection standards in Taiwan).

Botanical: Dendrobium fimbriatum Hook var. oculatum Hook

English.Preparation: Dry herb: 7 to 15 g. Fresh herb: 15 to 38 g.
English.Contraindications: Large dosages may cause inhibiting effects on heart and lung functions; overdosages may cause convulsions.
English.Research: Identification of dendrobium has been documented in scientific research.
English.Notes: Shi hu ye guang wan produced in mainland China may not meet health department inspection standards in Taiwan.

Chinese.Preparation: 口服：煎湯，10-15克。如果使用新鮮草藥：15-30克。外用：適量。捣碎新鮮草药并涂抹或制成粉末涂抹在患处。
Chinese.Contraindications: 研究中观察到轻微毒性；然而，在对兔子和老鼠的给药研究中没有发现显著的不良反应。
Chinese.Research: 该草药显示出抗微生物特性、解毒效果、止血效果以及对HBV的活性。它还缓解了接触六氯化苯造成的组织损伤。
Chinese.Notes: 在某些研究中，煎剂的效果不如酊剂明显。
Chemical Ingredients: 槲皮素-3-O-(2-鞣酸基)-β-D-葡萄糖苷

English.Preparation: Taking orally: make into decoction, 10-15 g. If using fresh herb: 15-30 g. External use: Appropriate amount. Smash fresh herb and apply or make into powder and apply on affected areas.
English.Contraindications: Mild toxicity observed in studies; however, no significant adverse effects were noted in administration studies on rabbits and rats.
English.Research: The herb has shown anti-microbial properties, a detoxifying effect, hemostatic effects, and activity against HBV. It also mitigates tissue damage from exposure to benzene hexachloride.
English.Notes: The effect of the decoction was not as pronounced as the tincture in certain studies.

Maladies Treated: 痛苦和虚弱的腰部和膝盖
Chinese.Preparation: 15 到 25 克煎汤；也可用于药丸或粉末形式。外用时使用适量。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在阴虚或无血瘀的情况下谨慎使用。
Chinese.Research: 骨碎补注射剂可以预防兔子的高胆固醇，可以预防和治疗动脉硬化和斑块形成。它促进钙的吸收，改善血液中的钙和磷水平，有益于骨骼愈合。它抑制伤害并改善肾功能。
Chinese.Notes: 改善软骨细胞的功能，延缓细胞退化。

Maladies Treated: Painful and weak loin and knees
Impact injuries of bones and sinews
English.Preparation: 15 to 25 g in decoction; may also be used in pill forms or powder form. For external application, use an appropriate amount.
English.Contraindications: Use with care in cases of yinxu (yin deficient) or without xue yu (blood stasis).
English.Research: Gu sui bu injectiones can be used to prevent high cholesterol in rabbits and can prevent and treat arteriosclerosis and plaque formation. It promotes calcium absorption and improves calcium and phosphorus levels in blood, benefitting bone healing. It inhibits injuries and improves kidney function.
English.Notes: Improves the function of cartilage cells and delays the degeneration of cells.

Chinese.Preparation: 3到9克
Chinese.Contraindications: 在气虚和贫血状态下不宜使用。
Chemical Ingredients: 3'-异戊酰-0-天冬酰-3',4'-二羟基香芹酮

English.Preparation: 3 to 9 g
English.Contraindications: Not to use in qi deficient and anemic conditions.

Chinese.Preparation: 作为煎剂，每天3 -10克。作为粉末，每次1 - 1.5克。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在阴虚情况下不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 对中枢神经系统的作用：镇静、抗癫痫、镇痛作用。对心脏和血管的作用：保护心脏肌肉免受缺血损害，改善冠状动脉和大脑的血流。
Chinese.Notes: 天麻在传统医学中有着悠久的使用历史，并被列为CITES管制物质。
Chemical Ingredients: 对羟基甲基苯基-β-D-葡萄糖吡喃苷

English.Preparation: As a decoction, 3 -10 g daily. As powder, 1 - 1.5 g each time.
English.Contraindications: Should not be used in case of yinxu (yin deficient).
English.Research: Effect on the CNS: sedation, anti-seizure, painkilling effect. Effect on heart and blood vessels: protects the heart muscle from lacking circulation, improves blood flow in the coronary artery, and to the brain.
English.Notes: Tian ma has a long history of use in traditional medicine and is classified as a controlled material under CITES.

Chinese.Preparation: 3到10克的种子可以用来煮成 decoction。
Chinese.Contraindications: 在水痘、天花、气虚和大便稀松的情况下不宜使用。
Chinese.Research: 研究表明它具有抗生素特性，能够降低血糖，具有退烧效果，并显示出潜在的抗肿瘤活性。
Chinese.Notes: 植物的部分包括种子、根和叶子，各自具有多种药用功能。

Maladies Treated: Swelling and pain of the throat
Acute or chronic inflammation of the throat
English.Preparation: 3 to 10 g of seeds can be used to make decoctions.
English.Contraindications: Not to be used in cases of chicken pox, small pox, qixu, and loose stool.
English.Research: Studies have shown it has antibiotic properties, lowers blood sugar, has antipyretic effects, and exhibits potential anti-tumor activity.
English.Notes: Parts of the plant include the seeds, roots, and leaves, each having various medicinal functions.
